S.FORM: Embiyax namu kana? prajing ta da!
Embiyax namo kana? prajing ta da!
Hiyug! thmuku!
Hiyog! thmoko!
Embiyax su, mtgsa!
Embiyax so, mtgsa!
Tluung!
Tloong!
Embiyax namu kana? emptgsa ku quri uqun Truku ka sayang.
Embiyax namo kana? emptgsa ko qori oqon Troko ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的太魯閣語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today I am going to teach you how to say food in Telugu.

S.FORM: Mkla su qmbahang ka kari mu hug?
Mkla so qmbahang ka kari mo hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you understand what the teacher says?

S.FORM: Mtgsa,ini ku kla.rngaw pxal duri hug?
Mtgsa,ini ko kla.rngaw pxal dori hog?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我不懂。可以再說一次嗎?
I don’t understand. Can you repeat it again?

S.FORM: Ini ku qbahang, paru hari hnang su rmngaw hug?
Ini ko qbahang, paro hari hnang so rmngaw hog?
S.TRANSL: 我聽不到，可以大聲一點嗎?
I can’t hear you, can you speak louder?

S.FORM: Qita hini,purug knan spug pxal.
Qita hini,porog knan spog pxal.
S.TRANSL: 請看這裡! 跟著我唸一遍。
Look here, please! Repeat after me.

S.FORM: Malu bi ka snpgan su.
Malo bi ka snpgan so.
Spug pxal duri.paru hari hnang su.
Spog pxal dori.paro hari hnang so.
S.TRANSL: Read it again. Please speak louder.

S.FORM: Kmlux hug? iya squwaq.
Kmlox hog? iya sqowaq.
Angal patas namu hug?
Angal patas namo hog?
Iq wah! mtgsa.
Iq wah! mtgsa.
Angal ppatas namu.
Angal ppatas namo.
Mtgsa, smhungi ku madas ppatas da.
Mtgsa, smhongi ko madas ppatas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Angal ssrus.
Angal ssros.
Mtgsa, smhungi ku madas ssrus da.
Mtgsa, smhongi ko madas ssros da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my eraser.

S.FORM: Siyuk kiyig mnseupu matas sunan ka ssrus.
Siyok kiyig mnseopo matas sonan ka ssros.
S.TRANSL: 請跟旁邊同學借橡皮擦。
Please borrow erasers from your classmates.

S.FORM: Siyuki ta ssrus su hug?
Siyoki ta ssros so hog?
Sangay ta da.
Sangay ta da.
Bitaq hini ka slhayan ta han,strung ta babaw sngayan duri.
Bitaq hini ka slhayan ta han,strong ta babaw sngayan dori.
S.TRANSL: 我們就上到這邊，下週再見。
Class dismissed, see you next week.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hug?
Ima so ka iso hog?
Yaku o Pawan.
Yako o Pawan.
Ima su ka isu?
Ima so ka iso?
Laqi ku Lbak ka yaku, Yudaw ka hangan mu.
Laqi ko Lbak ka yako, Yodaw ka hangan mo.
S.TRANSL: I am the son of Lbak, and my name is Yudaw.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hug?
Ima so ka iso hog?
Laqi ku empatas Mowna ka yaku, Ubus ka hangan mu.
Laqi ko empatas Mowna ka yako, Ubos ka hangan mo.
S.TRANSL: I am a student in Mowna, my name is Ubus.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su?
Ima ka hangan so?
Jiru ka hangan mu.
Jiro ka hangan mo.
Ima hangan na ka tama su?
Ima hangan na ka tama so?
Lowking ka hangan tama mu.
Lowking ka hangan tama mo.
Ima ka hiya hug?
Ima ka hiya hog?
Wilang ka hiya.
Wilang ka hiya.
Qbsuran mu snaw ka hiya, Awi ka hangan na.
Qbsoran mo snaw ka hiya, Awi ka hangan na.
S.TRANSL: He is my brother, his name is Awi.

S.FORM: Ima hangan na ka hiya?
Ima hangan na ka hiya?
Taing hangan na ka hiya.
Taing hangan na ka hiya.
Pawan ka hangan na hug?
Pawan ka hangan na hog?
Kiya o, Pawan ka hangan na..
Kiya o, Pawan ka hangan na..
Watan ka hangan na hug?
Watan ka hangan na hog?
Aji, Pisaw ka hangan na.
Aji, Pisaw ka hangan na.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Ipay ka hiya. Kuyuh qbsuran bubu mu.
Ipay ka hiya. Koyoh qbsoran bobo mo.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Lupung mu ka hiya, Lituk ka hangan na.
Lopong mo ka hiya, Litok ka hangan na.
S.TRANSL: 她是我的朋友，她的名字是Lituk。
She is my friend and her name is Lituk.

S.FORM: Piya hngkwasan su ka hngkawas sayang?
Piya hngkwasan so ka hngkawas sayang?
Maxal hngkwasan mu ka yaku.
Maxal hngkwasan mo ka yako.
Piya hngkwasan na sayang ka hiya?
Piya hngkwasan na sayang ka hiya?
Maxal dha hngkwasan na ka hiya.
Maxal dha hngkwasan na ka hiya.
Piya hngkwasan na ka tama su?
Piya hngkwasan na ka tama so?
Mrimal hngkwasan na ka tama mu.
Mrimal hngkwasan na ka tama mo.
Piya mnswayi su ka isu?
Piya mnswayi so ka iso?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Dha ka qbsuran mu ni kingal ka swayi mu.
Dha ka qbsoran mo ni kingal ka swayi mo.
S.TRANSL: 我有兩個兄姐，一個弟妹。
I have two brothers and sisters and one younger brother and sister.

S.FORM: Niqan qbsuran su snaw ka isu hug?
Niqan qbsoran so snaw ka iso hog?
Ungat qbsuran mu snaw ka yaku.
Ungat qbsoran mo snaw ka yako.
Niqan piya hiyi ka sapah su?
Niqan piya hiyi ka sapah so?
S.TRANSL: How many people are in your family?

S.FORM: Niqan spat hiyi ka ruwan sapah mu.
Niqan spat hiyi ka rowan sapah mo.
S.TRANSL: There are four of us in our family.

S.FORM: Gaga su matas inu?
Gaga so matas ino?
Nii ku matas alang Skangki.
Nii ko matas alang Skangki.
Ima ka hiya?
Ima ka hiya?
Snaw swayi tama mu ka hiya.
Snaw swayi tama mo ka hiya.
Manu qpahun na ka snaw qbsuran bubu su?
Mano qpahon na ka snaw qbsoran bobo so?
S.TRANSL: 你的舅舅從事什麼工作?
What does your uncle do for a living?

S.FORM: Knsat ka hiya.
Knsat ka hiya.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Qbsuran mu kuyuh ka hiya.
Qbsoran mo koyoh ka hiya.
Niqan qpahun na ka qbsuran su kuyuh hug?
Niqan qpahon na ka qbsoran so koyoh hog?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister have a job?

S.FORM: Gaga qmpah sapah spuhan ka hiya.
Gaga qmpah sapah spohan ka hiya.
Mnswayi ka dhiya hug?
Mnswayi ka dhiya hog?
S.TRANSL: 他們兩個人是兄弟姐妹嗎?

S.FORM: Uxay, lupung ka dhiya.
Uxay, lopong ka dhiya.
Seejiq su Tmpusu ka isu hug?
Seejiq so Tmposo ka iso hog?
Kiya o, Seejiq ku Truku ka yaku.
Kiya o, Seejiq ko Troko ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I'm from the Taroko tribe.

S.FORM: Seejiq Tmpusu ka bais su hug?
Seejiq Tmposo ka bais so hog?
Iq o, kiya ni seejiq Sbnawan ka hiya.
Iq o, kiya ni seejiq Sbnawan ka hiya.
Takar bi ka tama su hug?
Takar bi ka tama so hog?
Kiya, takar bi kana ka kingal ruwan sapah nami.
Kiya, takar bi kana ka kingal rowan sapah nami.
S.TRANSL: Yes, we are all very tall.

S.FORM: Gaga matas ka swayi su kuyuh dhug?
Gaga matas ka swayi so koyoh dhog?
S.TRANSL: Does your sister go to school?

S.FORM: Kiya, gaga matas da.
Kiya, gaga matas da.
Mkla rmngaw kari Truku ka swayi su hug?
Mkla rmngaw kari Troko ka swayi so hog?
S.TRANSL: Do your siblings speak the language?

S.FORM: Kiya o,mkla rmngaw kari Truku ka dhiya.
Kiya o,mkla rmngaw kari Troko ka dhiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: Piya ka mnswayi su?
Piya ka mnswayi so?
S.TRANSL: How many brothers and sisters do you have?

S.FORM: Niqan tru ka mnswayi mu.
Niqan tro ka mnswayi mo.
S.TRANSL: I have three brothers and sisters.

S.FORM: Mseupu su mniq tama ni bubu su ka isu hug?
Mseopo so mniq tama ni bobo so ka iso hog?
S.TRANSL: 你和爸爸媽媽一起住嗎?
Do you live with your parents?

S.FORM: Kiya, mseupu ku tama ni bubu mu.
Kiya, mseopo ko tama ni bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 是，我和爸爸媽媽一起住。
Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

S.FORM: Mseupu su tghuy mniq baki ni payi su hug?
Mseopo so tghoy mniq baki ni payi so hog?
S.TRANSL: 你和爺爺奶奶一起住嗎?
Do you live with your grandparents?

S.FORM: Ini, ini ku mniq baki ni payi mu.
Ini, ini ko mniq baki ni payi mo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我沒和跟他們一起住。
No, I didn't live with them.

S.FORM: Mseupu su tghuy ima ka isu?
Mseopo so tghoy ima ka iso?
Mseupu ku tama, bubu ni qbsuran mu snaw.
Mseopo ko tama, bobo ni qbsoran mo snaw.
S.TRANSL: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥住在一起。
I live with my father, mother and brother.

S.FORM: Pnaah su inu?
Pnaah so ino?
Pnaah ku alang Skangki.
Pnaah ko alang Skangki.
Gaga inu ka sapah namu?
Gaga ino ka sapah namo?
Gaga alang Skangki ka sapah nami.
Gaga alang Skangki ka sapah nami.
Gaga inu ka alang su?
Gaga ino ka alang so?
Gaga alang Taypaq.
Gaga alang Taypaq.
Gaga inu ka alang namu?
Gaga ino ka alang namo?
Gaga alang Skangki ka alang nami.
Gaga alang Skangki ka alang nami.
Mha su knuwan ka alang su?
Mha so knowan ka alang so?
S.TRANSL: 你什麼時候會回去部落?
When are you going back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Musa ku sngayan rbagan kdjiyax.
Mosa ko sngayan rbagan kdjiyax.
S.TRANSL: I will go back in the summer.

S.FORM: Yaku o laqi ku Truku.
Yako o laqi ko Troko.
Mgmeenu ka karat sayang?
Mgmeeno ka karat sayang?
Mnkala hidaw da, mtalux bi ka karat.
Mnkala hidaw da, mtalox bi ka karat.
S.TRANSL: The sun is coming out, it's very hot.

S.FORM: Mskuy bi ka ngangut hug?
Mskoy bi ka ngangot hog?
S.TRANSL: Is it going to be cold outside?

S.FORM: Mskuy bi, powsa lala lukus.
Mskoy bi, powsa lala lokos.
S.TRANSL: It's cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Mtalux bi ka ngangut hug?
Mtalox bi ka ngangot hog?
Ini, sbgihur da, mtltu balay.
Ini, sbgihor da, mtlto balay.
Mgmeenu ka karat sayang?
Mgmeeno ka karat sayang?
Ini ktalux ni ini kskuy ka sayang, malu bi.
Ini ktalox ni ini kskoy ka sayang, malo bi.
S.TRANSL: 今天不冷也不熱，很舒服。
It's neither cold nor hot today, very comfortable.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat keeman hug?
Mgmeeno ka karat keeman hog?
Ungat rulung ka karat baraw, sriyu ka ppngrah da.
Ungat rolong ka karat baraw, sriyo ka ppngrah da.
S.TRANSL: 天空沒有雲，星星出來了。
There were no clouds in the sky; the stars came out.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat ngangut?
Mgmeeno ka karat ngangot?
Hana msuwal, sriyu ka hidaw ni hakaw utux da.
Hana msowal, sriyo ka hidaw ni hakaw otox da.
S.TRANSL: 雨剛剛停，出了太陽，彩虹出來了。
The rain has just stopped, the sun has come out, the rainbow is coming out.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu karat ka gaga su nniqan hiya?
Mgmeeno karat ka gaga so nniqan hiya?
Sbgihur paru ka hini.
Sbgihor paro ka hini.
S.TRANSL: We're going to have a big storm here.

S.FORM: Malu karat ka hiya hug?
Malo karat ka hiya hog?
Malu bi, hidaw paru.
Malo bi, hidaw paro.
S.TRANSL: Very well, out of the big sun.

S.FORM: Mha ku matas da.
Mha ko matas da.
S.TRANSL: I have to go to school.

S.FORM: Mskuy bi ka karat,powsa lala lukus.
Mskoy bi ka karat,powsa lala lokos.
S.TRANSL: The weather is very cold, so wear more clothes.

S.FORM: Mha ku mlatat da.
Mha ko mlatat da.
Pquyux paru kiya da, iya snguhi madas bubung.
Pqoyox paro kiya da, iya sngohi madas bobong.
S.TRANSL: 等一下會下大雨，你要記得帶傘。
It's going to rain heavily, you have to remember to bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Empquyux hug?
Empqoyox hog?
Embruwa sayang bi, ida bi pquyux ka kiya.
Embrowa sayang bi, ida bi pqoyox ka kiya.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛打雷了，等一下應該就會下雨。
There was thunder just now, and it's supposed to rain later.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da hug?
Qmoyox da hog?
qnuyux sayang,msuwal ka sayang da.
qnoyox sayang,msowal ka sayang da.
S.TRANSL: 剛剛有下雨，現在雨停了。
It just rained, and now it's stopped.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da hug?
Qmoyox da hog?
Mdka bi qmuyux da,mghuriq ka elug.
Mdka bi qmoyox da,mghoriq ka elog.
S.TRANSL: 好像下過雨了，馬路是濕的。
It seems to have rained and the road is wet.

S.FORM: Qmnuyux hug? ma mhuriq kana ka lukus su?
Qmnoyox hog? ma mhoriq kana ka lokos so?
S.TRANSL: 有下雨嗎?你怎麼全身都濕了?
Is it raining? Why are you all wet?

S.FORM: Qmuyux ka ngangut,ini ku adas bubung da.
Qmoyox ka ngangot,ini ko adas bobong da.
S.TRANSL: 外面在下雨，我沒有帶雨傘。
It's raining outside, so I didn't bring an umbrella.

S.FORM: Embiyax su uri hug?
Embiyax so ori hog?
Paru bi ka bgihur, miyuk tunux mu ni mnarux bi.
Paro bi ka bgihor, miyok tonox mo ni mnarox bi.
S.TRANSL: The wind is blowing so hard that my head hurts.

S.FORM: Embiyax su uri hug?
Embiyax so ori hog?
Paru bi ka hidaw, thdagan ka tunux mu ni mtkwini da.
Paro bi ka hidaw, thdagan ka tonox mo ni mtkwini da.
S.TRANSL: 太陽好大，曬得我頭好暈。
The sun is so big, it makes me dizzy.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas ppatas da.
Smhongi ko madas ppatas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my pen.

S.FORM: Ksiyukay mi su.
Ksiyokay mi so.
Smhungi ku madas quway da.
Smhongi ko madas qoway da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my chopsticks.

S.FORM: Ini ku adas ka yaku uri,lita marig.
Ini ko adas ka yako ori,lita marig.
S.TRANSL: I don't have one either, let's go buy one.

S.FORM: Lita ta marig ppatas hug?
Lita ta marig ppatas hog?
S.TRANSL: Let's go buy a pen, shall we?

S.FORM: Iq, embarig ku ssrus uri.
Iq, embarig ko ssros ori.
S.TRANSL: Well, I still have to buy erasers.

S.FORM: Lita ta marig nhapuy mgrbug hug?
Lita ta marig nhapoy mgrbog hog?
S.TRANSL: Let's go get breakfast, shall we?

S.FORM: Aji ku, mnkan ku paah sapah da.
Aji ko, mnkan ko paah sapah da.
S.TRANSL: No, I've already eaten at home.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku pstalux hndayu da.
Smhongi ko pstalox hndayo da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to steam my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Sai pstalux nhari.
Sai pstalox nhari.
Smhungi ku madas hndayu da.
Smhongi ko madas hndayo da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring my lunchbox.

S.FORM: Seupu ta mkan hndayu mu da!
Seopo ta mkan hndayo mo da!
S.TRANSL: 那我們一起吃我的便當吧!
Then let's eat my lunch box together!

S.FORM: Mkan su manu ka ska hidaw?
Mkan so mano ka ska hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Meekan ku nhapuy ska ptasan.
Meekan ko nhapoy ska ptasan.
S.TRANSL: 我要吃學校的營養午餐。
I want a nutritious school lunch.

S.FORM: Meekan su manu ska hidaw?
Meekan so mano ska hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What are you having for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnadas ku hndayu ka sayang, seupu ta makan ska hidaw da.
Mnadas ko hndayo ka sayang, seopo ta makan ska hidaw da.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有帶便當，我們中午一起吃吧!
I've brought a lunchbox today, let's eat together at noon!

S.FORM: Lita hmrapas qurug rawa hug?
Lita hmrapas qorog rawa hog?
S.TRANSL: Let's go play basketball, shall we?

S.FORM: Iq o, lita da.
Iq o, lita da.
Lita hmrapas qurug ppaqun hug?
Lita hmrapas qorog ppaqon hog?
Aji ku, empatas ku.
Aji ko, empatas ko.
Jiyagi ku mangal sksik hug?
Jiyagi ko mangal sksik hog?
S.TRANSL: Please help me with the broom.

S.FORM: Iq, bgay mu sunan ka sksik nii.
Iq, bgay mo sonan ka sksik nii.
S.TRANSL: Okay, here's a broomstick for you.

S.FORM: jiyagi ku mangal galiq hug?
jiyagi ko mangal galiq hog?
S.TRANSL: Can you help me with the cloth?

S.FORM: Nii ku smsik, Plawa Lowking jiyagi ku mangal ksa.
Nii ko smsik, Plawa Lowking jiyagi ko mangal ksa.
S.TRANSL: I'm sweeping the floor, ask Lowking to get it for you.

S.FORM: Mhdu su smsik dhug?
Mhdo so smsik dhog?
Mhdu ku smsik da.
Mhdo ko smsik da.
Ma su ini sksik na?
Ma so ini sksik na?
Mhdu ku smsik da.
Mhdo ko smsik da.
Mruciq bi ka dxgal, sai smrus han.
Mrociq bi ka dxgal, sai smros han.
S.TRANSL: The floor is dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Iq, Mha ku mangal galiq.
Iq, Mha ko mangal galiq.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll go get the cloth.

S.FORM: Mruciq bi ka bling gaga, sai smrus han.
Mrociq bi ka bling gaga, sai smros han.
S.TRANSL: 那個窗戶很髒，去擦一下。
That window is very dirty, go clean it.

S.FORM: Yahan na, ini ku khdu smsik hini na.
Yahan na, ini ko khdo smsik hini na.
S.TRANSL: 等一下，我還沒掃完這裡。
Wait a minute, I'm not done sweeping here yet.

S.FORM: Empqpah su manu ka kiya?
Empqpah so mano ka kiya?
Mha ku miing mtgsa.
Mha ko miing mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to see my teacher.

S.FORM: Emphuya su ka malax matas kiya?
Emphoya so ka malax matas kiya?
S.TRANSL: What do you do after school?

S.FORM: Mha ku mseupu meuyas lupung mu.
Mha ko mseopo meoyas lopong mo.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to sing with my friends.

S.FORM: Emphuya malax matas ka hiya?
Emphoya malax matas ka hiya?
Mha tmapaq yayung ka hiya.
Mha tmapaq yayong ka hiya.
Gaga sapah ka Lituk?
Gaga sapah ka Litok?
Nii sapah hini,tmay ruwan.
Nii sapah hini,tmay rowan.
S.TRANSL: She’s at home, please come in.

S.FORM: Gaga sapah ka Ciwas?
Gaga sapah ka Ciwas?
Ungat hini, niqan kari su hug?
Ungat hini, niqan kari so hog?
S.TRANSL: 她不在，請問你有什麼事?
She’s not here, what can I do for you?

S.FORM: Ima hug?
Ima hog?
Baki, yaku Ribix wah, rwahi rhngun su hug?
Baki, yako Ribix wah, rwahi rhngon so hog?
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, I’m Ribix, please open the door.

S.FORM: Ima su ka isu hug?
Ima so ka iso hog?
Ukan, yaku o Iming, miyah ku miing sunan jita hmrapas da.
Ukan, yako o Iming, miyah ko miing sonan jita hmrapas da.
S.TRANSL: Ukan, I’m Iming, I’ve come to play with you.

S.FORM: Psiyaq ta ini tqita da.
Psiyaq ta ini tqita da.
Kiya o, lmnglung ku bi sunan, iyah ta pprngaw da.
Kiya o, lmnglong ko bi sonan, iyah ta pprngaw da.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我很想念你。快來聊天吧!
Yeah! I miss you so much. Come on, let’s chat!

S.FORM: Tluung, imah ucia.
Tloong, imah ocia.
S.TRANSL: Please sit down and have some tea.

S.FORM: Mhuway su bi.
Mhoway so bi.
Imah ucia.
Imah ocia.
Wa! tayal malu mahan ucia namu.
Wa! tayal malo mahan ocia namo.
Seupu ta mkan hiyi pnegalang!
Seopo ta mkan hiyi pnegalang!
Kiya, suyang bi qtaan ka hiyi pnegalang dnii.
Kiya, soyang bi qtaan ka hiyi pnegalang dnii.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!這些水果看起來很棒。

S.FORM: Malu uqun ka hiyi pnegalang hug?
Malo oqon ka hiyi pnegalang hog?
Kiya, balay bi malu uqun .
Kiya, balay bi malo oqon .
Mnhdu mhapuy uqun gbiyan ka bubu da, iyah mkan nhari!
Mnhdo mhapoy oqon gbiyan ka bobo da, iyah mkan nhari!
S.TRANSL: 媽媽煮好晚餐了，快來吃吧!
Mom has cooked dinner, come and eat!

S.FORM: Iq, emptrima ku baga han.
Iq, emptrima ko baga han.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go wash my hands.

S.FORM: Ququ mkan, aji su seejiq isil ka isu.
Qoqo mkan, aji so seejiq isil ka iso.
S.TRANSL: 盡量吃喝，你又不是外人。
Try to eat and drink as much as possible, you’re not an outsider.

S.FORM: Lala bi uqan mu da, mtngi ku bi da.
Lala bi oqan mo da, mtngi ko bi da.
S.TRANSL: I ate a lot, I’m full.

S.FORM: Uqi lala hari, Iya qsiqa.
Uqi lala hari, Iya qsiqa.
Iq o, malu bi uqun.
Iq o, malo bi oqon.
Mha ku da, tqita ta pxal duri.
Mha ko da, tqita ta pxal dori.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，下次再來看你。
I’m leaving, I’ll see you next time.

S.FORM: Iq o, swayay ta han.
Iq o, swayay ta han.
Keeman bi da, mha ku sapah da.
Keeman bi da, mha ko sapah da.
Iyah tghuy duri ha!
Iyah tghoy dori ha!
Knhuway musa.
Knhoway mosa.
Iq, niqan jiyax su do o iyah tghuy sapah duri.
Iq, niqan jiyax so do o iyah tghoy sapah dori.
S.TRANSL: Okay, come to my house sometime.

S.FORM: Embiyax namu kana, Madas ku munan sayang mha ta qmita alang rudan.
Embiyax namo kana, Madas ko monan sayang mha ta qmita alang rodan.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去部落訪問耆老。
Hello everyone, today I’m taking you to the tribe to interview the elders.

S.FORM: Iq o, mha ta empprngaw drudan.
Iq o, mha ta empprngaw drodan.
S.TRANSL: 好喔!我們要跟耆老說太魯閣語。
Yes! We have to speak Telugu to the seniors.

S.FORM: Aji ta biyaw dhuq da hug?
Aji ta biyaw dhoq da hog?
Aji biyaw da.
Aji biyaw da.
Baki, miyah nami qmita sunan da.
Baki, miyah nami qmita sonan da.
S.TRANSL: Grandpa, we’ve come to see you.

S.FORM: Ah! mkla namu rmngaw kari Truku o! Tayal knmalu ki da!
Ah! mkla namo rmngaw kari Troko o! Tayal knmalo ki da!
S.TRANSL: 你們會說太魯閣語啊!真是太棒了!

S.FORM: Embiyax namu kana, madas ku munan mha ta qmita hnmaan masu hiya.
Embiyax namo kana, madas ko monan mha ta qmita hnmaan maso hiya.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，老師今天要帶大家去小米田。
Hello everyone, today my teacher is going to take you to the millet field.

S.FORM: Kiya, mtgsa.
Kiya, mtgsa.
Iyah psbkug kana, iya shungi adas qnqaya namu.
Iyah psbkog kana, iya shongi adas qnqaya namo.
S.TRANSL: 大家過來排隊，記得帶好工具。
Come and line up, remember to bring your tools.

S.FORM: Iq o, mtgsa, madas nami qnqaya kana da.
Iq o, mtgsa, madas nami qnqaya kana da.
S.TRANSL: 是的，老師，我們都拿好工具了。
Yes, sir, we’ve got our tools.

S.FORM: Dhuq ta da hug?
Dhoq ta da hog?
Ini na, thiyaq bi na.
Ini na, thiyaq bi na.
S.TRANSL: Not yet, it’s still far away.

S.FORM: Usa mlaq qsiya ka isu.
Usa mlaq qsiya ka iso.
Iq, yaku ka emplaq qsiya na.
Iq, yako ka emplaq qsiya na.
Usa mangal kraji liwaq qbhni ka isu.
Usa mangal kraji liwaq qbhni ka iso.
S.TRANSL: You go get the bird catcher.

S.FORM: Iq, yaku ka mha lmiwaq qbhni.
Iq, yako ka mha lmiwaq qbhni.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I’ll go and catch the birds.

S.FORM: Embiyax namu kana, mha ta tbgan klgan mneuedus ka sayang.
Embiyax namo kana, mha ta tbgan klgan mneoedos ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: 大家好，我們今天要去動物園。
Hello everyone, we are going to the zoo today.

S.FORM: Tayal knmalu kida! emphuya ta msa musa?
Tayal knmalo kida! emphoya ta msa mosa?
S.TRANSL: 好棒喔!我們要怎麼去呢?
Awesome! How are we going to get there?

S.FORM: Empeapa ta tdruy bahu.
Empeapa ta tdroy baho.
Enduwa psbkug kana, embarig ta paya da.
Endowa psbkog kana, embarig ta paya da.
S.TRANSL: 大家排好隊，我們準備買票。
Everyone line up, we are ready to buy tickets.

S.FORM: Iq wa.
Iq wa.
Brah o klgan qbhni, bukuy o klgan quyu,qita nanak.
Brah o klgan qbhni, bokoy o klgan qoyo,qita nanak.
S.TRANSL: 前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。
There are birds in the front and snakes in the back.

S.FORM: Mtgsa, meisug ku quyu ka yaku.
Mtgsa, meisog ko qoyo ka yako.
Ini huya, asi usa qmita qbhni ka isu da.
Ini hoya, asi osa qmita qbhni ka iso da.
S.TRANSL: It doesn’t matter, then you go and watch the birds.

S.FORM: Babaw kingal iyax tuki do iyah ta pssli hini duri..
Babaw kingal iyax toki do iyah ta pssli hini dori..
S.TRANSL: 我們一個小時後回來集合。
We’ll be back in an hour.

S.FORM: Iq wa, mhuway su mtgsa.
Iq wa, mhoway so mtgsa.
Manu ka qntaan su suni.
Mano ka qntaan so soni.
Qmita ku lala bi quyu ni qbhni.
Qmita ko lala bi qoyo ni qbhni.
S.TRANSL: 我看到了好多蛇，還有好多鳥。
I saw a lot of snakes and a lot of birds.

S.FORM: Nhari, mha ta da.
Nhari, mha ta da.
S.TRANSL: Hurry up, we have to go.

S.FORM: Lita ta tmapaq yayung hug?
Lita ta tmapaq yayong hog?
Iq wa, lita da!
Iq wa, lita da!
Hbaraw bi seejiq ka nii tmapaq yayung hini.
Hbaraw bi seejiq ka nii tmapaq yayong hini.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of people swimming here.

S.FORM: Msqguq bi ka qsiya gaga, tapaq ta yayung hini da kiya da.
Msqgoq bi ka qsiya gaga, tapaq ta yayong hini da kiya da.
S.TRANSL: 那裡水很深，我們在這裡游泳就好。
The water is deep there, so we just swim here.

S.FORM: Hnuya su sa miyah?
Hnoya so sa miyah?
Mnksa ku.
Mnksa ko.
Pnapa su tdruy manu ka miyah?
Pnapa so tdroy mano ka miyah?
S.TRANSL: What kind of car did you take?

S.FORM: Pnapa ku tdruy bahu.
Pnapa ko tdroy baho.
Huya su sa musa pnrhulan?
Hoya so sa mosa pnrholan?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to church?

S.FORM: Seapa ku na tdruy tama mu.
Seapa ko na tdroy tama mo.
Hnuya msa musa ptasan kdjiyax ka hiya?
Hnoya msa mosa ptasan kdjiyax ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he usually go to school?

S.FORM: Peapa mslikaw ppaan ka musa ptasan.
Peapa mslikaw ppaan ka mosa ptasan.
S.TRANSL: He took the subway to school.

S.FORM: Hnuya msa musa marig pajiq ka payi su?
Hnoya msa mosa marig pajiq ka payi so?
S.TRANSL: How does your grandmother go to the grocery store?

S.FORM: Pneapa tdruy pupuk gakat musa marig pajiq ka hiya.
Pneapa tdroy popok gakat mosa marig pajiq ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She went to the grocery store on a motorcycle.

S.FORM: Huya su msa musa ka alang Ran-yig?
Hoya so msa mosa ka alang Ran-yig?
S.TRANSL: How are you going to get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Peapa ku asu ka musa Ranyig.
Peapa ko aso ka mosa Ranyig.
S.TRANSL: I want to take a boat to Lanyu.

S.FORM: Huya msa musa Ran-yig ka hiya?
Hoya msa mosa Ran-yig ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How did he get to Orchid Island?

S.FORM: Pneapa asu skiya musa Ranyig ka hiya.
Pneapa aso skiya mosa Ranyig ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took a plane to Orchid Island.

S.FORM: Peapa tdruy manu musa Takaw ka hiya?
Peapa tdroy mano mosa Takaw ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: What bus did he take to Kaohsiung?

S.FORM: Peapa tdruy qrngul musa Takaw ka hiya.
Peapa tdroy qrngol mosa Takaw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He took the THSR to Kaohsiung.

S.FORM: Pnapa tdruy qrngul musa Tayto ka hiya hug?
Pnapa tdroy qrngol mosa Tayto ka hiya hog?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Kiya,pnapa tdruy qrngul musa Tayto ka hiya.
Kiya,pnapa tdroy qrngol mosa Tayto ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, he took a train to Taitung.

S.FORM: Pnapa tdruy qrngul musa Tayto ka hiya hug?
Pnapa tdroy qrngol mosa Tayto ka hiya hog?
S.TRANSL: Did he take a train to Taitung?

S.FORM: Aji,Pnapa asu skiya musa Tayto ka hiya.
Aji,Pnapa aso skiya mosa Tayto ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he took a plane to Taitung.

S.FORM: Niqan ppaan tdruy bahu ka dalih hini hug?
Niqan ppaan tdroy baho ka dalih hini hog?
S.TRANSL: Is there a bus stop near here?

S.FORM: Niqan,slagu su mksa do qtaun su ka pepaan tdruy bahu da.
Niqan,slago so mksa do qtaon so ka pepaan tdroy baho da.
S.TRANSL: 有，往前走就會看到公車站了。
Yes, if you go straight ahead, you will see the bus stop.

S.FORM: Sdalih bi ppaan elug tdruy mktruma dxgal o quri inu hug?
Sdalih bi ppaan elog tdroy mktroma dxgal o qori ino hog?
S.TRANSL: 離這裡最近的捷運站在哪裡?
Where is the nearest MRT station?

S.FORM: Ungat ppaan elug tdruy mktruma dxgal ka hini,asi su ka peapa tdruy qapi.
Ungat ppaan elog tdroy mktroma dxgal ka hini,asi so ka peapa tdroy qapi.
S.TRANSL: 這裡沒有捷運站，你只能坐計程車。
There is no MRT station here, you can only take a taxi.

S.FORM: Khnu qbsiyaqan pdhuq ptasan ka peapa ta tdruy bahu hug?
Khno qbsiyaqan pdhoq ptasan ka peapa ta tdroy baho hog?
S.TRANSL: How long does it take to get to the school by bus?

S.FORM: Maxal rima spngan tuki ka pdhuq ptasan.
Maxal rima spngan toki ka pdhoq ptasan.
Khnu qbsiyaqn pdhuq Tayciyu ka peapa ta tdruy qrngul hug?
Khno qbsiyaqn pdhoq Tayciyo ka peapa ta tdroy qrngol hog?
S.TRANSL: 搭高鐵要多久時間會到臺中?
How long does it take to get to Taichung by THSR?

S.FORM: Kingal iyax tuki ka pdhuq Tayciyu.
Kingal iyax toki ka pdhoq Tayciyo.
S.TRANSL: I will come to Taichung in an hour.

S.FORM: Mgriq tdruy musa U-ray o bsiyaq hug?
Mgriq tdroy mosa U-ray o bsiyaq hog?
S.TRANSL: Is it a long drive to Ulai?

S.FORM: Yaa bi kingal iyax tuki.
Yaa bi kingal iyax toki.
Khnu qbsiyaqan peapa su elug tdruy mktruma dxgal ka miyah su sapah mu hug?
Khno qbsiyaqan peapa so elog tdroy mktroma dxgal ka miyah so sapah mo hog?
S.TRANSL: 你搭捷運來我家要多久?
How long did it take you to come to my house by subway?

S.FORM: Empusal spngan tuki.
Emposal spngan toki.
Mkla su peapa tdruy gakat hug?
Mkla so peapa tdroy gakat hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to ride a bicycle?

S.FORM: Mkla ku peapa tdruy gakat ka yaku.
Mkla ko peapa tdroy gakat ka yako.
Niqan tdruy pupuk gakat su hug?
Niqan tdroy popok gakat so hog?
Niqan kingal tdruy pupuk gakat mu ka yaku.
Niqan kingal tdroy popok gakat mo ka yako.
Niqan tdruy pupuk gakat su hug.
Niqan tdroy popok gakat so hog.
Ungat tdruy pupuk gakat mu ka yaku.
Ungat tdroy popok gakat mo ka yako.
Mtduwa ku smiling sunan hug?
Mtdowa ko smiling sonan hog?
Tduwa, smruwa ku bi.
Tdowa, smrowa ko bi.
Mtduwa ku smiling sunan?
Mtdowa ko smiling sonan?
Aji ku, aji lala ka gklaan mu ka yaku.
Aji ko, aji lala ka gklaan mo ka yako.
S.TRANSL: Don't, I don't know much about it.

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su babaw kndaxan hug? Kmusa ku bi qmita sunan?
Niqan jiyax so babaw kndaxan hog? Kmosa ko bi qmita sonan?
S.TRANSL: 你下午有空嗎?我想去拜訪你可以嗎?
Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to visit you, is that okay?

S.FORM: Iq, mtaga ku sapah mu sunan.
Iq, mtaga ko sapah mo sonan.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I'll wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su saman hug? kmpsiling ku quri endaan Truku sbiyaw.
Niqan jiyax so saman hog? kmpsiling ko qori endaan Troko sbiyaw.
S.TRANSL: 你明天有空嗎?我想請問你關於太魯閣族的傳說故事。
Are you free tomorrow? I would like to ask you about the legend of the Truku people.

S.FORM: Mha ku daya ka saman, aji ku mniq sapah.
Mha ko daya ka saman, aji ko mniq sapah.
S.TRANSL: 明天我要去山上，不在家喔。
I'm going to the mountains tomorrow, so I won't be home.

S.FORM: Qnbahangan mu o mkla su bi quri knkla rudan sbiyaw ka isu,kmpsiling ku bi sunan.
Qnbahangan mo o mkla so bi qori knkla rodan sbiyaw ka iso,kmpsiling ko bi sonan.
S.TRANSL: 我聽說您對阿美族的傳統習俗非常了解，想要請教您一下。
I heard that you are very familiar with the traditional customs of the Amis, so I would like to ask you a few questions. *Please change [Amis] to your ethnic group.

S.FORM: Aji lala ka klaan mu, kiya ka kiya ni ququ ku msiyuk wah.
Aji lala ka klaan mo, kiya ka kiya ni qoqo ko msiyok wah.
S.TRANSL: 我所了解的不多，但是我會盡量回答。
I don't know much about it, but I will try to answer as best I can.

S.FORM: Mtduwa ku muda mangakl sasaw utux hug? kika mha lxan bi klaan hici.
Mtdowa ko moda mangakl sasaw otox hog? kika mha lxan bi klaan hici.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄影嗎?這樣以後比較容易記錄。
Can I record the video? It will be easier to record in the future.

S.FORM: Iq o, tduwa.
Iq o, tdowa.
Piya hngkwasan su ka hkawas sayang?
Piya hngkwasan so ka hkawas sayang?
Mngari kmxalan maspat ku da.
Mngari kmxalan maspat ko da.
Embbiyax su bi na.
Embbiyax so bi na.
Ini wa! rudan ku da.
Ini wa! rodan ko da.
Pnaah su inu hug?
Pnaah so ino hog?
Pnaah ku alang Dumung.
Pnaah ko alang Domong.
Seejiq Bunun ka kuyuh su hug?
Seejiq Bonon ka koyoh so hog?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的太太也是布農族人嗎?
Is your wife also a Bunun?

S.FORM: Aji, seejiq Embgala ka hiya.
Aji, seejiq Embgala ka hiya.
Mnmanu klgan kari klaan su rmngaw ka isu?
Mnmano klgan kari klaan so rmngaw ka iso?
Mkla ku rmngaw kari Rukay ni kari Paywang ka yaku.
Mkla ko rmngaw kari Rokay ni kari Paywang ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 我會說魯凱語和排灣語。

S.FORM: Qrasun mu balay mtduwa ku smiling sunan ka sayang,rngaw cici han,quri pndakar tmsamat ga?
Qrason mo balay mtdowa ko smiling sonan ka sayang,rngaw cici han,qori pndakar tmsamat ga?
S.TRANSL: 今天很高興能訪問您，請您談一下，有關狩獵的禁忌好嗎?
It's a pleasure to interview you today, can you talk about the taboo of hunting?

S.FORM: Iq wa, embiyax ku siida o musa ku tmsmat dgiyaq kdjiyax ka yaku.
Iq wa, embiyax ko siida o mosa ko tmsmat dgiyaq kdjiyax ka yako.
S.TRANSL: 好的。我年輕的時候很常上山打獵。
Yes. I used to go hunting in the mountains when I was young.

S.FORM: Mhuway su bi, Tayal bi knmalu ka tnisa su sayang.
Mhoway so bi, Tayal bi knmalo ka tnisa so sayang.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝，您今天所教導的真是太棒了。
Thank you, what you taught me today was really great.

S.FORM: Ini bi qnuqu ka rnngaw mu, hnici snruan rudan sbiyaw.
Ini bi qnoqo ka rnngaw mo, hnici snroan rodan sbiyaw.
S.TRANSL: 我所説的都是千真萬確的，祖先所流傳的講述。
All that I say is true, the sayings of my ancestors.

S.FORM: Bitaq hini ka snlingan mu sunan, mqaras ku balay ka pnseasu su kari.
Bitaq hini ka snlingan mo sonan, mqaras ko balay ka pnseaso so kari.
S.TRANSL: 今天的訪談就到這邊。非常謝謝您的分享。
That's all for today's interview. Thank you very much for sharing with us.

S.FORM: Iya qsiqa, pprngaw ta duri.
Iya qsiqa, pprngaw ta dori.
Mowsa ku da, smulu ku qmbahang lala bi endaan su sbiyaw duri.
Mowsa ko da, smolo ko qmbahang lala bi endaan so sbiyaw dori.
S.TRANSL: 我要離開了，期待下次聽到更多的故事。
I'm going to leave now and look forward to hearing more stories next time.

S.FORM: Iq wa, knhuway musa.
Iq wa, knhoway mosa.
Embiyax su,embarig su manu?
Embiyax so,embarig so mano?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Embari ku kingal tutu mahan.
Embari ko kingal toto mahan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a cup.

S.FORM: Embiyax su, embarig su manu?
Embiyax so, embarig so mano?
S.TRANSL: Hello, what do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Embarig ku kingal qbubu.
Embarig ko kingal qbobo.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy a hat.

S.FORM: Barig ku tutu mahan, niqan sbrigan hug?
Barig ko toto mahan, niqan sbrigan hog?
S.TRANSL: 我要買杯子，你們有賣嗎?
I want to buy a cup, do you sell them?

S.FORM: Niqan, embarig su piya?
Niqan, embarig so piya?
S.TRANSL: Yes, how many do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Niqan sbrigan sbiki hug?
Niqan sbrigan sbiki hog?
Ungat, ini nami barig sbiki.
Ungat, ini nami barig sbiki.
S.TRANSL: No, we don't sell betel nut.

S.FORM: Embarig ku buwax.
Embarig ko bowax.
Embarig su piya lubuy?
Embarig so piya loboy?
S.TRANSL: How many packs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Biqi ku tru lubuy.
Biqi ko tro loboy.
Embarig ku bunga.
Embarig ko bonga.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Wada brigan kana da.
Wada brigan kana da.
S.TRANSL: All the sweet potatoes are sold out.

S.FORM: Embarig ku dha lungaw qalu.
Embarig ko dha longaw qalo.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two bottles of oil.

S.FORM: Wana msngari kingal lungaw da.
Wana msngari kingal longaw da.
S.TRANSL: We only have one bottle left.

S.FORM: Seani ku marig balung rudux.
Seani ko marig balong rodox.
Piya spngan ka brigun su?
Piya spngan ka brigon so?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Embarig su piya spngan hnjilan ka balung rudux?
Embarig so piya spngan hnjilan ka balong rodox?
S.TRANSL: How many pounds of eggs do you want to buy?

S.FORM: Embarig ku dha spngan.
Embarig ko dha spngan.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two catties.

S.FORM: Embarig ku dha bkiyan pixil.
Embarig ko dha bkiyan pixil.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy two green onions.

S.FORM: Msngari tru bkiyan ka hini, asi misu biqi kana.
Msngari tro bkiyan ka hini, asi miso biqi kana.
S.TRANSL: There are three left, all for you!

S.FORM: Piya pila ka kingal lubuy buwax nii?
Piya pila ka kingal loboy bowax nii?
S.TRANSL: How much is this bag of rice?

S.FORM: Dha kbkuy pila ka kingal lubuy.
Dha kbkoy pila ka kingal loboy.
Spuun kana do empusal kingal buhug,empusal buhug do kiya da.
Spoon kana do emposal kingal bohog,emposal bohog do kiya da.
Mhuway su.
Mhoway so.
Mngari kmxalan rima buhug ka hini.
Mngari kmxalan rima bohog ka hini.
Embarig ku cicih duri, pdhqi ku kingal kbkuy buhug.
Embarig ko cicih dori, pdhqi ko kingal kbkoy bohog.
S.TRANSL: I'll buy some more, and make up 100 yuan.

S.FORM: Rima kbkuy maxal buhug kana.
Rima kbkoy maxal bohog kana.
Asi ku spgi rima kbkuy buhug da hug?
Asi ko spgi rima kbkoy bohog da hog?
Tayal kngkrayan ka nii da, ghki ku cicih hug?
Tayal kngkrayan ka nii da, ghki ko cicih hog?
S.TRANSL: 這個太貴了，可以算便宜一點嗎?
It's too expensive, can you make it cheaper?

S.FORM: Ini tduwa, mhnuk bi ka nii da.
Ini tdowa, mhnok bi ka nii da.
S.TRANSL: 不行，這個已經很便宜了。
No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: Embarig ku kingal lbuan emu nii.
Embarig ko kingal lboan emo nii.
S.TRANSL: I want this packet of cookies.

S.FORM: Mtrul buhug ka emu nii, embarig su manu duri hug?
Mtrol bohog ka emo nii, embarig so mano dori hog?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Mtduwa ku kmsiyuk pila su hug?
Mtdowa ko kmsiyok pila so hog?
S.TRANSL: Can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Tduwa o! piya ka ksiyukun su?
Tdowa o! piya ka ksiyokon so?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How much do you need?

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas pila da, mtduwa ku kmsiyuk pila su hug?
Smhongi ko madas pila da, mtdowa ko kmsiyok pila so hog?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Ini ku adas ka yaku uri o!
Ini ko adas ka yako ori o!
S.TRANSL: I don't have any money either!

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas pila da.mtduwa ku kmsiyuk pila su hug?
Smhongi ko madas pila da.mtdowa ko kmsiyok pila so hog?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Aji ku, ini saku biqi ka knsiyukan su pnlealay na.
Aji ko, ini sako biqi ka knsiyokan so pnlealay na.
S.TRANSL: 不要，上次借的錢你都還沒還我。
No, you haven't paid me back the money you borrowed last time.

S.FORM: Mtduwa ku kmsiyuk lukus su hug?
Mtdowa ko kmsiyok lokos so hog?
Iq, ngali nanak.
Iq, ngali nanak.
Mtduwa ku kmsiyuk patas su?
Mtdowa ko kmsiyok patas so?
Wada mu ksiyukun Ribix da.
Wada mo ksiyokon Ribix da.
Ksiyukun ta tdruy gakat su hug?
Ksiyokon ta tdroy gakat so hog?
S.TRANSL: 請借給我你的腳踏車好嗎?
Can I borrow your bicycle, please?

S.FORM: Iq o, kiya ka kiya ni bqani ku saman duri.
Iq o, kiya ka kiya ni bqani ko saman dori.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

S.FORM: Qmuyux da,ini ku adas bubung, ksiyukun ta bubung su hug?
Qmoyox da,ini ko adas bobong, ksiyokon ta bobong so hog?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It's raining, I don't have an umbrella, can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Wana kingal bi ka bubung mu, pseupu ta bubung da!
Wana kingal bi ka bobong mo, pseopo ta bobong da!
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let's stick together!

S.FORM: Knsiyukan mu sunan ka patas nii, bgay mu sunan da.
Knsiyokan mo sonan ka patas nii, bgay mo sonan da.
S.TRANSL: 這是你上次借我的書，還給你。
This is the book you borrowed from me last time, I give it back to you.

S.FORM: Kmqita su patas manu o tduwa su rmngaw knan.
Kmqita so patas mano o tdowa so rmngaw knan.
S.TRANSL: 還想看什麼書都可以跟我說。
You can tell me what else you want to read.

S.FORM: Knuwan ka prihun misu pila?
Knowan ka prihon miso pila?
S.TRANSL: When do I have to pay you back?

S.FORM: Ini huya, niqan pila su siida do biqi ku da.
Ini hoya, niqan pila so siida do biqi ko da.
S.TRANSL: 沒關係，你有錢的時候再說。
It doesn't matter, you can talk about it when you have money.

S.FORM: Biqun su knuwan ka pila mu da?
Biqon so knowan ka pila mo da?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to pay me back?

S.FORM: Biqun su saman.
Biqon so saman.
S.TRANSL: I'll return it to you tomorrow.

S.FORM: Biqun su knuwan ka patas mu?
Biqon so knowan ka patas mo?
S.TRANSL: When are you going to return my book?

S.FORM: Aji misu wada biqan shiga dhug?
Aji miso wada biqan shiga dhog?
S.TRANSL: 我昨天不是已經還你了嗎?
Didn't I return it to you yesterday?

S.FORM: Knsiyukan su na Pawan ka ppatas nii hug?
Knsiyokan so na Pawan ka ppatas nii hog?
S.TRANSL: Did Pawan lend you this pen?

S.FORM: Kiya, knsiyukan mu suni.
Kiya, knsiyokan mo soni.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I borrowed it from him today.

S.FORM: Knsiyukan su na Lowking ka ppatas nii hug?
Knsiyokan so na Lowking ka ppatas nii hog?
S.TRANSL: Did you borrow this pen from Lowking?

S.FORM: Aji, bnrigan bubu mu ka nii.
Aji, bnrigan bobo mo ka nii.
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

S.FORM: Ungat ka cimu da, usa kmsiyuk cicih cimu Suking han.
Ungat ka cimo da, osa kmsiyok cicih cimo Soking han.
S.TRANSL: We are out of salt, let's borrow some from Suking.

S.FORM: Iq wa, mha ku kmsiyuk.
Iq wa, mha ko kmsiyok.
Sayi mlawa ka Yabung, bqani ku ka pila mu da ksa.
Sayi mlawa ka Yabong, bqani ko ka pila mo da ksa.
S.TRANSL: Go tell Yabung to give me my money back.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka knsiyukan su na?
Piya pila ka knsiyokan so na?
S.TRANSL: How much does she owe you?

S.FORM: Mha su inu?
Mha so ino?
Mha ku hmaan pajiq hiya mhuma pajiq.
Mha ko hmaan pajiq hiya mhoma pajiq.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Nii su hmuya?
Nii so hmoya?
Lala bi ka spriq da, nii ku tmatak, emplaq ku qsiya ka sayang da.
Lala bi ka spriq da, nii ko tmatak, emplaq ko qsiya ka sayang da.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，我在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There’s too much grass, I’m cutting it, I’ll have to water it later.

S.FORM: Bqani knan ka sowki ni bkaruh hug?
Bqani knan ka sowki ni bkaroh hog?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?
Will you get my scythes and hoes, please?

S.FORM: Gaga su psaun inu?
Gaga so psaon ino?
Gaga psaan kiyig qraq susu sudu hiya.
Gaga psaan kiyig qraq soso sodo hiya.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Kpowxan su ka dxgal dhug?
Kpowxan so ka dxgal dhog?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: Hana mu daan makux ka dxgal, mtukuy ku sayang da.
Hana mo daan makox ka dxgal, mtokoy ko sayang da.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。
I just turned over the soil, and so on to sow seeds.

S.FORM: Mtduwa ngalan ka phmaan su paji dhug?
Mtdowa ngalan ka phmaan so paji dhog?
S.TRANSL: 你種的菜可以收成了嗎?
Are your vegetables ready to be harvested?

S.FORM: Mtduwa ngalan ka pajiq qurung hini da, ini tduwa ngalan ka spriq utux hiya na.
Mtdowa ngalan ka pajiq qorong hini da, ini tdowa ngalan ka spriq otox hiya na.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草就還不能收成。
The cabbage here is ready to be harvested, but the Showa grass there is not yet ready to be harvested.

S.FORM: Wa! Tayal lala ka knriyan su bunga.
Wa! Tayal lala ka knriyan so bonga.
S.TRANSL: 哇!你挖了這麼多的地瓜。
Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

S.FORM: Jiyagi ku powsa rpun hug?
Jiyagi ko powsa rpon hog?
S.TRANSL: Will you help me with the barn?

S.FORM: Nii namu hmuya?
Nii namo hmoya?
Nii nami powsa srahug empqraq nami qsurux.
Nii nami powsa srahog empqraq nami qsorox.
S.TRANSL: We’re releasing fishing nets to catch fish.

S.FORM: Lala qsurux ka hini hug?
Lala qsorox ka hini hog?
Lala bi qnrapan qsurux ka ska rawa psaan qsurux.
Lala bi qnrapan qsorox ka ska rawa psaan qsorox.
S.TRANSL: 魚簍裡已經抓了很多魚。
The fish basket has been full of fish.

S.FORM: Huya su msa qmraq qsurux ka kdjiyax?
Hoya so msa qmraq qsorox ka kdjiyax?
S.TRANSL: How do you usually catch fish?

S.FORM: Dmuuy ku aga meytaq qsurux.
Dmooy ko aga meytaq qsorox.
S.TRANSL: I shoot fish with a spear.

S.FORM: Mkla su dmuuy buji tmsamat?
Mkla so dmooy boji tmsamat?
S.TRANSL: Do you know how to hunt with a bow and arrow?

S.FORM: Qmlubung ku tmsamat kjiyax, msuwil ku dmuuy puniq ni madas huling ka tmsamat.
Qmlobong ko tmsamat kjiyax, msowil ko dmooy poniq ni madas holing ka tmsamat.
S.TRANSL: 我通常都是用陷阱抓獵物，偶爾也會拿槍帶狗狩獵。
I usually catch my prey with a trap, but occasionally I hunt with a gun and a dog.

S.FORM: Elug endan bowyak ka nii.
Elog endan bowyak ka nii.
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

S.FORM: Ma su mkla hug?
Ma so mkla hog?
Dapil bowyak ka nii, kiya ni elug endan bowyak ka nii.
Dapil bowyak ka nii, kiya ni elog endan bowyak ka nii.
S.TRANSL: 這是山豬的腳印，所以這是山豬所走的路。
These are the footprints of the boar, so this is the path the boar took.

S.FORM: Sai ta qmita nhari ka qlubung ta, mdka bi gaga tjiyal samat da.
Sai ta qmita nhari ka qlobong ta, mdka bi gaga tjiyal samat da.
S.TRANSL: 快去看我們的陷阱，好像抓到獵物了。
Go and see our trap, for it seems that we have caught our prey.

S.FORM: Ma su mkla hug?
Ma so mkla hog?
Mdka bi smknux knux ka huling da,Lita smnegul nhari.
Mdka bi smknox knox ka holing da,Lita smnegol nhari.
S.TRANSL: 狗好像聞到味道了。我們快跟過去。
The dog seems to have smelled it. Let’s follow them.

S.FORM: Nii su smmalu qaya manu?
Nii so smmalo qaya mano?
S.TRANSL: 你正在製作的是什麼東西?

S.FORM: Dangar ka nii, spqraq qowlit.
Dangar ka nii, spqraq qowlit.
S.TRANSL: 這是石壓式陷阱，用來抓老鼠的。
This is a stone trap, used to catch rats.

S.FORM: Qaya manu ka gaga su psaan hiya?
Qaya mano ka gaga so psaan hiya?
S.TRANSL: 你放在那裡的是什麼東西?
What is that thing you put there?

S.FORM: Qlubung ka gaga, spqraq nami pada.
Qlobong ka gaga, spqraq nami pada.
S.TRANSL: 那是套腳式繩索陷阱，我們用它來抓山羌。
It was a leg-rigged rope trap, and we used it to catch Shankiang.

S.FORM: Qrasun ta balay ka huway utux rudan, lala bi nangal ta samat ka sayang.
Qrason ta balay ka howay otox rodan, lala bi nangal ta samat ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: 感謝祖靈賜福，今天我們有很多獵物收獲。
Thanks to the blessing of our ancestors, we had a great harvest today.

S.FORM: Kiya o, dsun ta pseasu alang ka samat da.
Kiya o, dson ta pseaso alang ka samat da.
S.TRANSL: 是啊!我們帶回部落好好分享吧!
Yeah! Let’s take it back to the tribe and share it!

S.FORM: Emptgsa ku munan quri kari truku mneudus.
Emptgsa ko monan qori kari troko mneodos.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家動物的太魯閣語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of animals in Truku language today.

S.FORM: Emptgsa ku munan quri kari truku hmnru.
Emptgsa ko monan qori kari troko hmnro.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家植物的太魯閣語怎麼說。

S.FORM: Emptgsa ku munan quri kari truku hiyi pnegalang.
Emptgsa ko monan qori kari troko hiyi pnegalang.
S.TRANSL: 今天老師要教大家水果的太魯閣語怎麼說。
I will teach everyone all kinds of fruits in Truku language today.

S.FORM: Iya taqi
Iya taqi
Iya rngaw kari.
Iya rngaw kari.
Iya ekan uqun.
Iya ekan oqon.
Angal ka patas su.
Angal ka patas so.
Angal ka ppatas su.
Angal ka ppatas so.
Angal ka pntasan su.
Angal ka pntasan so.
Sku ka patas.
Sko ka patas.
Sku ka ppatas.
Sko ka ppatas.
Sku ka uqun.
Sko ka oqon.
Sku ka rngayun.
Sko ka rngayon.
Nnima ka ppatas nii?
Nnima ka ppatas nii?
Nnaku.
Nnako.
Nnima ka patas nii?
Nnima ka patas nii?
NMowna kiya.
NMowna kiya.
Nnima ka ssrus nii?
Nnima ka ssros nii?
Ini ku kla.
Ini ko kla.
NMowna ka lukus gaga hug?
NMowna ka lokos gaga hog?
Uxay, NCiwang ka lukus nii.
Uxay, NCiwang ka lokos nii.
Emptgsa, ini ku adas patas.
Emptgsa, ini ko adas patas.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, I didn’t bring my textbook.

S.FORM: Seupug qmita yamu thiyan su matas.
Seopog qmita yamo thiyan so matas.
S.TRANSL: Share the book with your classmate next to you.

S.FORM: Emputuh ppatas muda.
Empotoh ppatas moda.
Duwuy ppatas matas.
Dowoy ppatas matas.
Ungat ka ssrus muda.
Ungat ka ssros moda.
ksyuki misu.
ksyoki miso.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser.

S.FORM: Sangay ta da, qlahang ka musa sapah!
Sangay ta da, qlahang ka mosa sapah!
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，回家路上要小心!
It is the end of the class, be careful on your way home.

S.FORM: Iq wah! Mhuway su balay emptgsa.
Iq wah! Mhoway so balay emptgsa.
Sangay ta da, swayay ta han.
Sangay ta da, swayay ta han.
S.TRANSL: 我們要下課了，大家再見。
The class is over, goodbye everyone.

S.FORM: Emptgsa swayay ta han.
Emptgsa swayay ta han.
Embiyax namu kana, Hangan mu o Mowna.
Embiyax namo kana, Hangan mo o Mowna.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Mowna.

S.FORM: Mowna embiyax su.
Mowna embiyax so.
Embiyax namu kana, Hangan mu o Samaw.
Embiyax namo kana, Hangan mo o Samaw.
S.TRANSL: Hello everyone, my name is Samaw.

S.FORM: Samaw embiyax su.
Samaw embiyax so.
Embiyax su, Yaku o Mowna.
Embiyax so, Yako o Mowna.
Mowna embiyax su, Yaku o Watan.
Mowna embiyax so, Yako o Watan.
Embiyax su, Yaku o Samaw.
Embiyax so, Yako o Samaw.
Samaw embiyax su, Yaku o Watan.
Samaw embiyax so, Yako o Watan.
Ima su ka isu?
Ima so ka iso?
Yaku o bubu ku Mowna, Tumun ku.
Yako o bobo ko Mowna, Tomon ko.
Ima su ka isu?
Ima so ka iso?
Yaku o swayi ku Mowna, hangan mu o Rubiq.
Yako o swayi ko Mowna, hangan mo o Robiq.
S.TRANSL: 我是Mowna的妹妹，我的名字是Rubiq。
I am Mowna’s sister. My name is Rubiq.

S.FORM: Ima ka hiya?
Ima ka hiya?
Emptgsa mu ka hiya, Hiya o Muyang.
Emptgsa mo ka hiya, Hiya o Moyang.
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Ima ka seejiq gaga?
Hiya o qbsuran mu snaw, Yudaw hangan na.
Hiya o qbsoran mo snaw, Yodaw hangan na.
Hiya o Samaw hug?
Hiya o Samaw hog?
Kiya, Hiya o Samaw.
Kiya, Hiya o Samaw.
Isu o Samaw hug?
Iso o Samaw hog?
Aji! Yaku o Mowna.
Aji! Yako o Mowna.
Ima ka Samaw?
Ima ka Samaw?
Yaku ka Samaw.
Yako ka Samaw.
Ima ka Watan?
Ima ka Watan?
Lupung mu ka Watan.
Lopong mo ka Watan.
Ima hangan na ka qbsuran su kuyuh?
Ima hangan na ka qbsoran so koyoh?
S.TRANSL: What is your elder sister’s name?

S.FORM: Hangan na o Biyang.
Hangan na o Biyang.
S.TRANSL: My elder sister’s name is Biyang.

S.FORM: Ima hangan na ka swayi su kuyuh?
Ima hangan na ka swayi so koyoh?
S.TRANSL: What is your younger sister’s name?

S.FORM: Hangan na o Ipay.
Hangan na o Ipay.
S.TRANSL: My younger sister’s name is Ipay.

S.FORM: Klaun su hangan na hug?
Klaon so hangan na hog?
Hiya o Cihung.
Hiya o Cihong.
Piya hngkwasan na ka qbsuran su snaw?
Piya hngkwasan na ka qbsoran so snaw?
S.TRANSL: How old is your elder brother?

S.FORM: Maxal rima ka hngkwasan na.
Maxal rima ka hngkwasan na.
Piya hngkwasan na ka swayi su snaw?
Piya hngkwasan na ka swayi so snaw?
S.TRANSL: How old is your younger brother?

S.FORM: Rima ka hngkwasan na.
Rima ka hngkwasan na.
Niqan ptasan ka alang namu hiya hug?
Niqan ptasan ka alang namo hiya hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you have schools in your community?

S.FORM: Niqan.
Niqan.
Gaga su matas alang hiya hug?
Gaga so matas alang hiya hog?
S.TRANSL: 你在部落的學校讀書嗎?
Do you study in your tribe’s school?

S.FORM: Kiya. matas nami hiya mdka nami kingal ruwan sapah.
Kiya. matas nami hiya mdka nami kingal rowan sapah.
S.TRANSL: 是的，在學校讀書我們像一家人。
Yes, we are like family while we are studying at school.

S.FORM: Ima ka snaw gaga?
Ima ka snaw gaga?
Hiya o swayi tama mu.
Hiya o swayi tama mo.
Ima ka kuyuh gaga?
Ima ka koyoh gaga?
Hiya o qbsuran mu kuyuh.
Hiya o qbsoran mo koyoh.
Ima ka laqi gaga?
Ima ka laqi gaga?
Hiya o swayi mu snaw.
Hiya o swayi mo snaw.
Manu qpahun na ka bubu su?
Mano qpahon na ka bobo so?
S.TRANSL: 你的媽媽從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Hiya o mrata.
Hiya o mrata.
Manu qpahun na ka tama su?
Mano qpahon na ka tama so?
S.TRANSL: 你的爸爸從事什麼工作?

S.FORM: Hiya o emptgsa.
Hiya o emptgsa.
Hiya o swayi su snaw hug?
Hiya o swayi so snaw hog?
Aji, Hiya o lupung swayi mu.
Aji, Hiya o lopong swayi mo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我弟弟的朋友。
No, he is my younger brother’s friend.

S.FORM: Hiya o qbsuran su kuyuh hug?
Hiya o qbsoran so koyoh hog?
Aji, Hiya o swayi mu kuyuh.
Aji, Hiya o swayi mo koyoh.
S.TRANSL: No, she is my younger sister.

S.FORM: Piya hmbragan hiyi ka sapah dha?
Piya hmbragan hiyi ka sapah dha?
S.TRANSL: How many people in their family?

S.FORM: Niqan rima hiyi ka ruwan sapah dha.
Niqan rima hiyi ka rowan sapah dha.
S.TRANSL: There are five people in their family.

S.FORM: Piya laqi ka sapah namu?
Piya laqi ka sapah namo?
S.TRANSL: How many children in your family?

S.FORM: Niqan spat hiyi.
Niqan spat hiyi.
S.TRANSL: There are four children in our family.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi swayi su?
Piya hiyi swayi so?
S.TRANSL: How many younger siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungat ka swayi mu snaw, Niqan tru hiyi ka swayi mu kuyuh.
Ungat ka swayi mo snaw, Niqan tro hiyi ka swayi mo koyoh.
S.TRANSL: 我沒有弟弟，有三位妹妹。
I don’t have any younger brothers, but I have three younger sisters.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi qbsuran su?
Piya hiyi qbsoran so?
S.TRANSL: How many older siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungat ka qbsuran mu.
Ungat ka qbsoran mo.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any older siblings.

S.FORM: Piya hiyi ka mnsawayi su?
Piya hiyi ka mnsawayi so?
S.TRANSL: How many siblings do you have?

S.FORM: Ungat ka mnswayi mu.
Ungat ka mnswayi mo.
Mnswayi namu ka yamu hug?
Mnswayi namo ka yamo hog?
Kiya! Hiya o qbsuran mu snaw.
Kiya! Hiya o qbsoran mo snaw.
Seejiq namu tnpusu ka yamu hug?
Seejiq namo tnposo ka yamo hog?
Kiya, Seejiq nami tnpusu ka yami.
Kiya, Seejiq nami tnposo ka yami.
Hiya o seejiq truku uri hug?
Hiya o seejiq troko ori hog?
Kiya, hiya o seejiq truku.
Kiya, hiya o seejiq troko.
S.TRANSL: 是的，她也是太魯閣族人。

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat sayang?
Mgmeeno ka karat sayang?
Mskuy hari ka sayang, Ququ mimah qsiya mtalux.
Mskoy hari ka sayang, Qoqo mimah qsiya mtalox.
S.TRANSL: 天氣有點冷，要多喝熱水。
It’s a bit cold, so you need to drink more warm water.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat sayang?
Mgmeeno ka karat sayang?
Mtalux ka karat sayang, Ququ mimah qsiya.
Mtalox ka karat sayang, Qoqo mimah qsiya.
S.TRANSL: It’s a bit hot, so you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat ngangut?
Mgmeeno ka karat ngangot?
Paru bi hidaw, iya pthidaw hiyi.
Paro bi hidaw, iya pthidaw hiyi.
S.TRANSL: The sun is bright and remember to wear sunscreen.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat ngangut?
Mgmeeno ka karat ngangot?
Lala bi rulung, Ungat hidaw ka iyax mtqiri babaw dxgal.
Lala bi rolong, Ungat hidaw ka iyax mtqiri babaw dxgal.
S.TRANSL: There are a lot of clouds but no sun in the sky.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat saman?
Mgmeeno ka karat saman?
Ungat hidaw ka saman. lala bi rulung. paru bi bgihur.
Ungat hidaw ka saman. lala bi rolong. paro bi bgihor.
S.TRANSL: 明天沒有太陽，雲很多，風很大。
It will be cloudy and windy but not sunny tomorrow.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat siida?
Mgmeeno ka karat siida?
S.TRANSL: How was the weather that day?

S.FORM: Mskuy ka karat siida. Plkusi lukus ka mlatat su.
Mskoy ka karat siida. Plkosi lokos ka mlatat so.
S.TRANSL: 這天有點冷，出門要穿外套。
It was a bit cold and you needed to wear a jacket when you went outside.

S.FORM: Mgmeenu ka karat jiyax sngayan siida?
Mgmeeno ka karat jiyax sngayan siida?
S.TRANSL: How’s the weather on the weekend?

S.FORM: Malu bi ka karat siida.
Malo bi ka karat siida.
S.TRANSL: It will be sunny on the weekend.

S.FORM: Empquyux ka karat siida hug?
Empqoyox ka karat siida hog?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Malu bi ka karat siida, Aji empquyux.
Malo bi ka karat siida, Aji empqoyox.
S.TRANSL: 那天天氣晴朗，不會下雨。
It will have no rain and be sunny that day.

S.FORM: Empquyux ka karat siida hug?
Empqoyox ka karat siida hog?
S.TRANSL: Will it be rainy that day?

S.FORM: Kiya! empquyux ka siida.
Kiya! empqoyox ka siida.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it will be rainy that day.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka sayang hug?
Gaga qmoyox ka sayang hog?
Msuwal da! sriyu ka hidaw da.
Msowal da! sriyo ka hidaw da.
S.TRANSL: The rain stops and the sun comes out.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka ngangut sayang hug?
Gaga qmoyox ka ngangot sayang hog?
Nii qmuyux da! Ini ku adas bubung.
Nii qmoyox da! Ini ko adas bobong.
S.TRANSL: It is raining and I don’t have an umbrella with me.

S.FORM: Gaga qmuyux ka ngangut hug?
Gaga qmoyox ka ngangot hog?
Ini quyux da, babaw ska hidaw do empquyux, mlatat su o adas bubung.
Ini qoyox da, babaw ska hidaw do empqoyox, mlatat so o adas bobong.
S.TRANSL: 現在沒有下雨，中午過後會下雨，出門要帶傘。
It is not raining now, but it will be rainy in the afternoon, so you need to bring an umbrella when you go out.

S.FORM: Hkawas misan o empskuy balay hug?
Hkawas misan o empskoy balay hog?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very cold in winter next year?

S.FORM: Kiya! Hkawas nii o mha mskuy balay, Plkusi lala hari lukus.
Kiya! Hkawas nii o mha mskoy balay, Plkosi lala hari lokos.
S.TRANSL: 是，明年冬天會很冷，要穿很多衣服。
Yes, it will be very cold in winter next year, so you need to put on extra layers.

S.FORM: Rbagan snii o mtalux balay hug?
Rbagan snii o mtalox balay hog?
S.TRANSL: Will it be very hot in summer this year?

S.FORM: Kiya! rbagan o mha mtalux balay, ququ mimah qsiya.
Kiya! rbagan o mha mtalox balay, qoqo mimah qsiya.
S.TRANSL: 是，夏天會很熱，要多喝水。
Yes, it will be very hot and you need to drink more water.

S.FORM: Smkuxul su bi srnabaw hug?
Smkoxol so bi srnabaw hog?
Smkuxul ku bi srnabaw, meeuxul bi ka karat siida.
Smkoxol ko bi srnabaw, meeoxol bi ka karat siida.
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡春天，天氣很溫暖。
I like spring because the weather is warm.

S.FORM: Smkuxul su bi krpuhan hug?
Smkoxol so bi krpohan hog?
Ini ku skuxul krpuhan, lala bi bgihur paru.
Ini ko skoxol krpohan, lala bi bgihor paro.
S.TRANSL: 我不喜歡秋天，秋天有好多颱風。
I don’t like autumn because there are lots of typhoons in autumn.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas patas da.
Smhongi ko madas patas da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the textbook.

S.FORM: Seupug ta qmita da.
Seopog ta qmita da.
S.TRANSL: I will share it with you.

S.FORM: Smhungi ku madas ssrus da.
Smhongi ko madas ssros da.
S.TRANSL: I forgot to bring the eraser.

S.FORM: Ksyuki misu.
Ksyoki miso.
Smhungi su madas ppatas dhug?
Smhongi so madas ppatas dhog?
S.TRANSL: Do you forget to bring your pen?

S.FORM: Kiya, Ksyuki ta ppatas su hug?
Kiya, Ksyoki ta ppatas so hog?
S.TRANSL: Yes, can you lend me a pen?

S.FORM: Meekan su manu ka ska hidaw?
Meekan so mano ka ska hidaw?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for lunch?

S.FORM: Meekan ku bawa.
Meekan ko bawa.
Meekan su manu ka keeman?
Meekan so mano ka keeman?
S.TRANSL: What would you like for dinner?

S.FORM: Meekan ku idaw.
Meekan ko idaw.
Mnkan su manu ka mgrbu hug?
Mnkan so mano ka mgrbo hog?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for breakfast?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku balung rudux.
Mnkan ko balong rodox.
Mnkan su manu ka ska hidaw hug?
Mnkan so mano ka ska hidaw hog?
S.TRANSL: What did you have for lunch?

S.FORM: Mnkan ku hiyi rudux.
Mnkan ko hiyi rodox.
Lita mrawa qurug qaqay.
Lita mrawa qorog qaqay.
Alay musa ka isu, yahun misu miing kiya da.
Alay mosa ka iso, yahon miso miing kiya da.
S.TRANSL: 你先去，我等一下去找你。
You go first and I will catch up later.

S.FORM: Lita tmapaq qsiya.
Lita tmapaq qsiya.
Iq wah! seupu ta musa.
Iq wah! seopo ta mosa.
Lita mrawa qurug.
Lita mrawa qorog.
Aji ku, Sai ta mhaqul ka patas han.
Aji ko, Sai ta mhaqol ka patas han.
S.TRANSL: No, we have to carry books first.

S.FORM: Smngus su gupun dhug?
Smngos so gopon dhog?
Ini na, Nii ku sminaw pratu.
Ini na, Nii ko sminaw prato.
S.TRANSL: Not yet. I am doing the dishes.

S.FORM: Sminaw su quwaq dhug?
Sminaw so qowaq dhog?
S.TRANSL: Did you rinse out your mouth?

S.FORM: Sminaw ku da.
Sminaw ko da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I rinsed out my mouth.

S.FORM: Sminaw su pratu dhug?
Sminaw so prato dhog?
Mnhdu ku sminaw da.
Mnhdo ko sminaw da.
Masu ini trima baga hug?
Maso ini trima baga hog?
S.TRANSL: Why didn’t you wash your hands?

S.FORM: Emptrima ku kiya hari.
Emptrima ko kiya hari.
S.TRANSL: I will wash my hands later.

S.FORM: Gaga su hmuya ka suni hug?
Gaga so hmoya ka soni hog?
S.TRANSL: What were you doing just now?

S.FORM: Mnsa ku miing emptgsa.
Mnsa ko miing emptgsa.
S.TRANSL: I went to meet the teacher.

S.FORM: Malax su ptasan do emphuya su dhug?
Malax so ptasan do emphoya so dhog?
S.TRANSL: What are you going to do after school?

S.FORM: Empknleelug ku nhari musa sapah.
Empknleelog ko nhari mosa sapah.
Malax ptasan ka hiya o emphuya dhug?
Malax ptasan ka hiya o emphoya dhog?
S.TRANSL: What is she doing after school?

S.FORM: Mowsa rmgrig ka hiya.
Mowsa rmgrig ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She is going to go dancing.

S.FORM: Apay, gaga su sapah hug?
Apay, gaga so sapah hog?
Niqan, tmay ruwan sapah.
Niqan, tmay rowan sapah.
Apay, gaga su sapah hug?
Apay, gaga so sapah hog?
Ungat hini ka Apay. Yuku o Ipay. Manu kari su? Nasi miyah do rngangun muda.
Ungat hini ka Apay. Yoko o Ipay. Mano kari so? Nasi miyah do rngangon moda.
S.TRANSL: Apay不在家耶。我是Ipay，有什麼事嗎? 回來我會轉告Apay。
Apay is not at home. I am Ipay. What can I do for you? I will let him know when he comes back.

S.FORM: Ima namu?
Ima namo?
Payi! Iyang ku ni Ipay wah! rwahi nami rhngun!
Payi! Iyang ko ni Ipay wah! rwahi nami rhngon!
S.TRANSL: 奶奶！我們是Iyang 和 Ipay，幫我們開門!
Grandma, we are Iyang and Ipay, please open the door for us.

S.FORM: Ima?
Ima?
Yaku o Buya, Miyah ku miing Utay.
Yako o Boya, Miyah ko miing Utay.
S.TRANSL: I am Buya, I am here for Utay.

S.FORM: Payi, miyah ku qmita sunan.
Payi, miyah ko qmita sonan.
S.TRANSL: Grandma, I am here to see you.

S.FORM: Bsiyaq su bi ini iyah da. Lnglungun misu balay.
Bsiyaq so bi ini iyah da. Lnglongon miso balay.
S.TRANSL: 你好久沒來了。我好想念你。
You haven’t been here for a long time. I missed you so much.

S.FORM: Api, Miyah ku miing sunan.
Api, Miyah ko miing sonan.
S.TRANSL: Api, I am here to play with you.

S.FORM: Tmay sapah nhari. Tmaga ku bsiyaq da.
Tmay sapah nhari. Tmaga ko bsiyaq da.
S.TRANSL: Come on in! I have been waiting for you for a long time.

S.FORM: Nhuma mu ka bunga nii, ekan binaw!
Nhoma mo ka bonga nii, ekan binaw!
S.TRANSL: 這是我種的地瓜，吃吃看!
This is the sweet potato I grow. Try it!

S.FORM: Tayal knsibus ka bunga nii.
Tayal knsibos ka bonga nii.
S.TRANSL: The sweet potato is so sweet.

S.FORM: Iyah! Nhuma mu nanak ka hiyi pnegalang nii. ekan binaw.
Iyah! Nhoma mo nanak ka hiyi pnegalang nii. ekan binaw.
S.TRANSL: 過來!這是我種的水果，吃看看。
Come here! These are the fruits I grow. You should try it.

S.FORM: Tayal knsibus ka hiyi qhuni nii.
Tayal knsibos ka hiyi qhoni nii.
Tluung! Nhuma mu nanak ka sqmu nii ini rusi sapuh!
Tloong! Nhoma mo nanak ka sqmo nii ini rosi sapoh!
S.TRANSL: 請坐!這是我種的有機玉米吃看看!
Take a seat! You should try some organic corn that I grow.

S.FORM: Wu! Tayal knsibus ka sqmu nii.
Wo! Tayal knsibos ka sqmo nii.
S.TRANSL: Wow! The corn tastes so sweet.

S.FORM: Ekan su mami hug?
Ekan so mami hog?
Ini ku tduwa mkan mami. ekan ku supaw do kida.
Ini ko tdowa mkan mami. ekan ko sopaw do kida.
S.TRANSL: 我不能吃橘子，我吃蘋果就好。
I can’t eat oranges. I will have some apples instead.

S.FORM: Ekan su emmu hug?
Ekan so emmo hog?
Iq wah, smkuxul ku balay.
Iq wah, smkoxol ko balay.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I like it very much.

S.FORM: Qlisi misu hiyi pnegalang.
Qlisi miso hiyi pnegalang.
S.TRANSL: Let me peel the fruit for you.

S.FORM: Mhway su balay. shiya bi ka hiyi qhuni nii.
Mhway so balay. shiya bi ka hiyi qhoni nii.
S.TRANSL: Thank you. This fruit is so juicy.

S.FORM: Imah ka qsiya nii.
Imah ka qsiya nii.
S.TRANSL: I will bring you some water.

S.FORM: Mhuway su balay.
Mhoway so balay.
Ququ mkan, Lala bi damat hnapuy mu.
Qoqo mkan, Lala bi damat hnapoy mo.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. I cooked a lot of dishes.

S.FORM: Wu! Shiya balay ni malu bi uqun.
Wo! Shiya balay ni malo bi oqon.
S.TRANSL: Oh! It smells good and looks delicious.

S.FORM: Ququ mkan, Lala bi ka hini na.
Qoqo mkan, Lala bi ka hini na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There is a lot more.

S.FORM: Aji ku qsiqa do!
Aji ko qsiqa do!
S.TRANSL: I’ll make myself at home then.

S.FORM: Ququ mkan, Lala bi ka hini na.
Qoqo mkan, Lala bi ka hini na.
S.TRANSL: Enjoy yourself. There are plenty here.

S.FORM: Wada ku mkan lala bi da. Aji ku tduwa mkan da.
Wada ko mkan lala bi da. Aji ko tdowa mkan da.
S.TRANSL: 我吃了好多，不能再吃了。
I ate a lot and couldn’t eat any more.

S.FORM: Madas yamu mowsa dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
Madas yamo mowsa dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去山上。
I will take you to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Rmngaw ka bubu lala bi labis ka dgiyaq.
Rmngaw ka bobo lala bi labis ka dgiyaq.
S.TRANSL: 媽媽說山上有很多蚊子。
Mom says that there are lots of mosquitoes in the mountains.

S.FORM: Madas yamu mowsa qmpahan ka mtgsa.
Madas yamo mowsa qmpahan ka mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: 老師今天要帶你們去田裡。
I will take you to the fields.

S.FORM: Mowsa ta makux dxgal hug?
Mowsa ta makox dxgal hog?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to loosen the soil?

S.FORM: Mowsa ta inu ka sayang?
Mowsa ta ino ka sayang?
Dsun ta na yayung ka mtgsa.
Dson ta na yayong ka mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the riverside.

S.FORM: Mowsa ta inu ka sayang?
Mowsa ta ino ka sayang?
Dsun ta na dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
Dson ta na dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: Teacher will take us to the mountains today.

S.FORM: Mowsa ta yayung ka sayang?
Mowsa ta yayong ka sayang?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the riverside today?

S.FORM: Aji, dsun ta na dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
Aji, dson ta na dgiyaq ka mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: 不是，老師要帶我們去山上。
No, our teacher is going to take us to the mountains.

S.FORM: Mowsa ta dgiyaq ka sayang?
Mowsa ta dgiyaq ka sayang?
S.TRANSL: Are we going to the mountains today?

S.FORM: Aji, mowsa ta qmpahan ka sayang.
Aji, mowsa ta qmpahan ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我們今天要去田裡。
No, we are going to the fields.

S.FORM: Mtgsa, mowsa ta qmita manu ka yayung?
Mtgsa, mowsa ta qmita mano ka yayong?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到河邊要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see at the riverside?

S.FORM: Mowsa ta qmita kjiyu.
Mowsa ta qmita kjiyo.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Mtgsa, mowsa ta qmita manu ka dgiyaq?
Mtgsa, mowsa ta qmita mano ka dgiyaq?
S.TRANSL: 老師，我們到山上要看什麼?
Teacher, what are we going to see in the mountains?

S.FORM: Mowsa ta qmita klaway.
Mowsa ta qmita klaway.
S.TRANSL: We are going to see butterflies.

S.FORM: Mowsa ta hmuya ka qmpahan?
Mowsa ta hmoya ka qmpahan?
S.TRANSL: What are we going to do in the fields?

S.FORM: Mowsa ta qmpahan qmita hnmaan sqmu, qlahang niqan qbhni, walu o!
Mowsa ta qmpahan qmita hnmaan sqmo, qlahang niqan qbhni, walo o!
S.TRANSL: 我們要到田裡看我們種的玉米，要小心有螞蟻、蜜蜂唷!
We are going to see the corn we grow in the fields, but you need to be aware of the ants and bees.

S.FORM: Mtgsa mowsa ta tmapaq yayung hug?
Mtgsa mowsa ta tmapaq yayong hog?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到河邊游泳嗎?
Teacher, are we going to swim in the river?

S.FORM: Aji, mowsa ta qmita kjiyu.
Aji, mowsa ta qmita kjiyo.
S.TRANSL: No, we are going to see dragonflies.

S.FORM: Mtgsa mowsa ta mhuma pajiq qmpahan?
Mtgsa mowsa ta mhoma pajiq qmpahan?
S.TRANSL: 老師我們要到田裡種菜嗎?
Teacher, are we going to grow some vegetables in the fields?

S.FORM: Mowsa ta makux dxgal.
Mowsa ta makox dxgal.
S.TRANSL: We are going to loosen the soil today.

S.FORM: Niqan kjiyu gaga skkiya hiya.
Niqan kjiyo gaga skkiya hiya.
Hana ku qmita sayang ka balay bi meudus kjiyu.
Hana ko qmita sayang ka balay bi meodos kjiyo.
S.TRANSL: 我今天才看過真正活著的蜻蜓。
Today is the first time I see real living dragonflies.

S.FORM: Niqan klaway gaga skkiya hiya.
Niqan klaway gaga skkiya hiya.
Wa! smkuxul ku bi klaway, suyang bi qtaan.
Wa! smkoxol ko bi klaway, soyang bi qtaan.
S.TRANSL: Yeh! Wow! I love butterflies. They are very beautiful.

S.FORM: Niqan klaway gaga skkiya hiya.
Niqan klaway gaga skkiya hiya.
Aji klaway ka gaga, walu ka gaga.
Aji klaway ka gaga, walo ka gaga.
S.TRANSL: Those are not butterflies. They are bees.

S.FORM: Qita hini hay, iya usa dhiyaq balay o!
Qita hini hay, iya osa dhiyaq balay o!
S.TRANSL: 在這裡看一看，不要到太遠的地方唷!
Come here and take a look. Don’t go too far!

S.FORM: Iq, aji nami mowsa dhiyaq bi!
Iq, aji nami mowsa dhiyaq bi!
S.TRANSL: 好，我們不會去太遠的地方。
Got it, we won’t go anywhere too far.

S.FORM: Iya ttalang, knhuway mksa aji su emptakur.
Iya ttalang, knhoway mksa aji so emptakor.
S.TRANSL: 不要用跑的，慢慢走免得跌倒了。
Don’t run and walk slowly lest you fall down.

S.FORM: Qmqita ku nhari.
Qmqita ko nhari.
S.TRANSL: I want to see them right away.

S.FORM: Huya su msa musa biyi?
Hoya so msa mosa biyi?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to the block-house?

S.FORM: Mgriq ku tdruy qapi musa biyi.
Mgriq ko tdroy qapi mosa biyi.
Huya msa musa spuhan ka hiya?
Hoya msa mosa spohan ka hiya?
S.TRANSL: How does he go to the hospital?

S.FORM: Mksa musa spuhan ka hiya.
Mksa mosa spohan ka hiya.
Huya su msa musa Pung Hug?
Hoya so msa mosa Pong Hog?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Peapa ku asu skaya musa Pung Hug.
Peapa ko aso skaya mosa Pong Hog.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by plane.

S.FORM: Huya su msa musa Pung Hug?
Hoya so msa mosa Pong Hog?
S.TRANSL: How do you go to Penghu?

S.FORM: Peapa ku asu musa Pung Hug.
Peapa ko aso mosa Pong Hog.
S.TRANSL: I go to Penghu by boat.

S.FORM: Huya su msa musa sapah?
Hoya so msa mosa sapah?
Peapa ku elug tdruy mktruma dxgal ka musa sapah.
Peapa ko elog tdroy mktroma dxgal ka mosa sapah.
Peapa manu musa ptasan ka Rabay?
Peapa mano mosa ptasan ka Rabay?
S.TRANSL: How does Rabay go to school?

S.FORM: Peapa tdruy qrngul musa ptasan ka Rabay.
Peapa tdroy qrngol mosa ptasan ka Rabay.
S.TRANSL: Rabay goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Peapa manu musa pnrhulan ka Pisaw?
Peapa mano mosa pnrholan ka Pisaw?
S.TRANSL: How does Pisaw go to church?

S.FORM: Peapa tdruy gakat musa pnrhulan ka Pisaw.
Peapa tdroy gakat mosa pnrholan ka Pisaw.
S.TRANSL: Pisaw goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Peapa su elug tdruy mktruma dxgal musa ptasan hug?
Peapa so elog tdroy mktroma dxgal mosa ptasan hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Aji, peapa ku tdruy bahu ka musa ptasan.
Aji, peapa ko tdroy baho ka mosa ptasan.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Peapa su tdruy gakat ka musa ptasan hug?
Peapa so tdroy gakat ka mosa ptasan hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: kiya, peapa ku tdruy gakat ka musa ptasan.
kiya, peapa ko tdroy gakat ka mosa ptasan.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: Peapa su tdruy qrngul pstlaway musa Takaw hug?
Peapa so tdroy qrngol pstlaway mosa Takaw hog?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Kiya, peapa ku tdruy qrngul ka musa Takaw.
Kiya, peapa ko tdroy qrngol ka mosa Takaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: Peapa su tdruy qrngul aji uri o peapa su asu skaya ka musa Taytung hug?
Peapa so tdroy qrngol aji ori o peapa so aso skaya ka mosa Taytong hog?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: Peapa ku asu skaya, yaasa mslikaw bi ka asu skaya.
Peapa ko aso skaya, yaasa mslikaw bi ka aso skaya.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: Peapa su tdruy bahu aji uri o mgriq su tdruy musa pnrhulan hug?
Peapa so tdroy baho aji ori o mgriq so tdroy mosa pnrholan hog?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Mgriq ku tdruy ka musa pnrhulan, yaasa slikaw bi dhuq ka tdruy.
Mgriq ko tdroy ka mosa pnrholan, yaasa slikaw bi dhoq ka tdroy.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: Dalih sapah su ka sbrigan hug?
Dalih sapah so ka sbrigan hog?

S.FORM: Aji dalih, mgriq ku tdruy pupuk gakat ka musa sbrigan.
Aji dalih, mgriq ko tdroy popok gakat ka mosa sbrigan.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去超市。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the market.

S.FORM: Dalih ptasan ka saan smku pila hug?
Dalih ptasan ka saan smko pila hog?
