S.FORM: Dalih bi, mksa do dhuq da.
Dalih bi, mksa do dhoq da.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Dalih ppyaan tdruy ka uqan hug?
Dalih ppyaan tdroy ka oqan hog?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Mlatat su ppyaan tdruy mksa su rima spngan tuki do dhuq da.
Mlatat so ppyaan tdroy mksa so rima spngan toki do dhoq da.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su sayang hug?
Niqan jiyax so sayang hog?
Hmuya hug?
Hmoya hog?
Mkmusa ku qmita sunan.
Mkmosa ko qmita sonan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Niqan daun mu ka sayang. Pxal da wa.
Niqan daon mo ka sayang. Pxal da wa.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: Niqan jiyax su ka saman hug? babaw kndeaxan mowsa ku miing sunan.
Niqan jiyax so ka saman hog? babaw kndeaxan mowsa ko miing sonan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Iq, tgaun misu sapah.
Iq, tgaon miso sapah.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Tduwa ku meangal kari mangal ka sunan hug? kmspatas mu.
Tdowa ko meangal kari mangal ka sonan hog? kmspatas mo.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Iq, tduwa.
Iq, tdowa.
Tduwa ka meangal sasaw mangal hug?
Tdowa ka meangal sasaw mangal hog?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Naqih ku qtaan, ini kragi ka rpun uri, aji ku hay.
Naqih ko qtaan, ini kragi ka rpon ori, aji ko hay.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: Psasing ku do kiya da.
Psasing ko do kiya da.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Aji ku ka psasing uri.
Aji ko ka psasing ori.
Mhuway su balay, sruwa su psiling knan.
Mhoway so balay, srowa so psiling knan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Ini huya, manu ka kmslingun su?
Ini hoya, mano ka kmslingon so?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Embiyax su sbiyaw o manu ka qpahun su?
Embiyax so sbiyaw o mano ka qpahon so?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Qpahun mu sbiyaw o knsat, sayang do wada ku msangay da.
Qpahon mo sbiyaw o knsat, sayang do wada ko msangay da.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: Niqan qpahun su ka sayang na?
Niqan qpahon so ka sayang na?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: Gaga ku qmpah ptasan.
Gaga ko qmpah ptasan.
Niqan laqi su gaga mniq alang?
Niqan laqi so gaga mniq alang?
S.TRANSL: 請問您的孩子也住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Ungat, gaga mniq alang paru ka laqi mu.
Ungat, gaga mniq alang paro ka laqi mo.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: Isu nanak ka mniq hini?
Iso nanak ka mniq hini?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Tmabug ku kingal huling ni kingal qbhni, dhiya o ida mdka kingal ruwan sapah mu.
Tmabog ko kingal holing ni kingal qbhni, dhiya o ida mdka kingal rowan sapah mo.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Tmabug ku kingal ngiyaw uri, niqan mneudus tguhuy o ini ta dungut.
Tmabog ko kingal ngiyaw ori, niqan mneodos tgohoy o ini ta dongot.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Mkmsmiling ku sunan quri gaya maduk.
Mkmsmiling ko sonan qori gaya madok.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Aji lala ka klaun mu, nasi niqan ka klaun mu o ida ku smiyuk sunan.
Aji lala ka klaon mo, nasi niqan ka klaon mo o ida ko smiyok sonan.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: Niqan manu ka gaya qngqaya maduk hug?
Niqan mano ka gaya qngqaya madok hog?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: Qngqaya nami maduk o ini tduwa tlngun kuyuh.
Qngqaya nami madok o ini tdowa tlngon koyoh.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Kuyuh gaga o tduwa mseupu musa maduk hug?
Koyoh gaga o tdowa mseopo mosa madok hog?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Ini tduwa, Ini tduwa musa maduk ka kuyuh uri.
Ini tdowa, Ini tdowa mosa madok ka koyoh ori.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Pisaw, ungat sinaw payay da, usa marig sinaw payay.
Pisaw, ongat sinaw payay da, osa marig sinaw payay.
S.TRANSL: Pisaw，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Pisaw, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Aji niqan kingal lungaw sinaw payay ka puyan, iya barig da.
Aji niqan kingal longaw sinaw payay ka poyan, iya barig da.
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧。
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Ini tuku ka kingal lungaw, usa marig dha lungaw duri.
Ini toko ka kingal longaw, osa marig dha longaw dori.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Embarig ku sinaw payay, niqan sbrigan ka yamu hini?
Embarig ko sinaw payay, niqan sbrigan ka yamo hini?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Niqan! embarig su piya?
Niqan! embarig so piya?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Embarig ku dha lungaw ni kingal buwax duri.
Embarig ko dha longaw ni kingal bowax dori.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Nii hini ka buwax, embarig su manu duri hug?
Nii hini ka bowax, embarig so mano dori hog?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還需要什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Embarig ku balung, niqan sbrigan?
Embarig ko balong, niqan sbrigan?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: Wada qduun marig kana ka balung da.
Wada qdoon marig kana ka balong da.
Embarig ku lukus.
Embarig ko lokos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Embarig su meenu lukus hug?
Embarig so meeno lokos hog?
S.TRANSL: What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: Embarig ku llbu usux lukus.
Embarig ko llbo osox lokos.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Huya msa ka lukus embanah nii?
Hoya msa ka lokos embanah nii?
Niqan lhang niya na?
Niqan lhang niya na?
Niqan embhgay ni mqliyang na.
Niqan embhgay ni mqliyang na.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Biqi ku kingal mqliyang lukus.
Biqi ko kingal mqliyang lokos.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Pisaw mnsa su inu ka sayang da? mnsa su psbrax hiyi hug ?
Pisaw mnsa so ino ka sayang da? mnsa so psbrax hiyi hog ?
S.TRANSL: Pisaw你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Pisaw, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Aji, musa ku dmayaw marig pajiq payi mu.
Aji, mosa ko dmayaw marig pajiq payi mo.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Kiya hug, niqan jiyax su ka keeman ? supu ta mkan nhapuy.
Kiya hog, niqan jiyax so ka keeman ? sopo ta mkan nhapoy.
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上有沒有空?要不要和我一起吃飯。
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Aji tduwa, mowsa ku marig lukus.
Aji tdowa, mowsa ko marig lokos.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Mowsa ku tghuy sunan.
Mowsa ko tghoy sonan.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Embiyax su, piya pila ka kingal pajiq nii?
Embiyax so, piya pila ka kingal pajiq nii?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Kingal o empusal pila.
Kingal o emposal pila.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka bunga nii?
Piya pila ka bonga nii?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Mtrul pila ka kingal spngan hnjilan bunga.
Mtrol pila ka kingal spngan hnjilan bonga.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Biqi ku dha pajiq ni kingal spngan hnjilan bunga.
Biqi ko dha pajiq ni kingal spngan hnjilan bonga.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Pisaw, smhungi ku madas ppatas da, tduwa saku ksiyukun hug?
Pisaw, smhongi ko madas ppatas da, tdowa sako ksiyokon hog?
S.TRANSL: Pisaw，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Pisaw, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Ungat ka naku uri, nRabay ka nii.
Ungat ka nako ori, nRabay ka nii.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Rabay’s.

S.FORM: Ksyuki ta pnais bi, biqun misu nhari.
Ksyoki ta pnais bi, biqon miso nhari.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Iq, ngali han.
Iq, ngali han.
Mhuway su bi, mhuway su bi ksa ka Rabay uri.
Mhoway so bi, mhoway so bi ksa ka Rabay ori.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Rabay for me.

S.FORM: Manu ka ksyukun su hug?
Mano ka ksyokon so hog?
Miyah ku muway dha patas.
Miyah ko moway dha patas.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Iq, manu ka ksyukun su duri hug?
Iq, mano ka ksyokon so dori hog?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: Miyah ku kmsiyuk tru patas duri.
Miyah ko kmsiyok tro patas dori.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Kiya da. Tru jiyax do yahi muway da.
Kiya da. Tro jiyax do yahi moway da.
S.TRANSL: 好了。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Ini saku biqi ka srus na.
Ini sako biqi ka sros na.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Wada ku muway shiga da.
Wada ko moway shiga da.
Ma ungat qtaan ka srus mu da.
Ma ongat qtaan ka sros mo da.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Aji su wada ksiyukun Pisaw da?
Aji so wada ksiyokon Pisaw da?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Pisaw?

S.FORM: Ini ku kla, saun mu smiling ka hiya.
Ini ko kla, saon mo smiling ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Ksiyukun misu ka ssrus mu han.
Ksiyokon miso ka ssros mo han.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Rabay, ksiyukan su na Pisaw ka lukus wagi nii hug?
Rabay, ksiyokan so na Pisaw ka lokos wagi nii hog?
S.TRANSL: Rabay, did Pisaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Aji, bnrigan ku na bubu mu.
Aji, bnrigan ko na bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Ma mdka likus wagi su ka lukus wagi Pisaw.
Ma mdka likos wagi so ka lokos wagi Pisaw.
S.TRANSL: Pisaw’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: Mqarux ka lukus wagi na, ini pndka ka lhang nami.
Mqarox ka lokos wagi na, ini pndka ka lhang nami.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Rabay, kmsiyuk su pila Pisaw hug?
Rabay, kmsiyok so pila Pisaw hog?
S.TRANSL: Rabay, did you borrow money from Pisaw?

S.FORM: Niqan, rubang mu biqun hyaan, smhungi ku madas pila da.
Niqan, robang mo biqon hyaan, smhongi ko madas pila da.
S.TRANSL: 有，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: Biqun su knuwan?
Biqon so knowan?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Biqun mu saman da.
Biqon mo saman da.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Iq, Jiyagun su rmngaw Pisaw.
Iq, Jiyagon so rmngaw Pisaw.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Pisaw for you.

S.FORM: Qulit o dangar ka tduwa qmrak, tkurih o durang ka tduwa qmrak, kika balay.
Qolit o dangar ka tdowa qmrak, tkorih o dorang ka tdowa qmrak, kika balay.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，⽵雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Kla saw kiya, mqnuqu ku da! kla kiya ida ku ini dhuq qmrak.
Kla saw kiya, mqnoqo ko da! kla kiya ida ko ini dhoq qmrak.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Cisaun su huya msa smalu ka dha wana nii?
Cisaon so hoya msa smalo ka dha wana nii?
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: B: Kiya hug! Tayal knsuyang ki da! tduwa ku qmrak samat ka hici da.
B: Kiya hog! Tayal knsoyang ki da! tdowa ko qmrak samat ka hici da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了！這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Bbaraw ka spriq qmpahan da. usa mangal sowki kawir, jita qmpahan.
Bbaraw ka spriq qmpahan da. osa mangal sowki kawir, jita qmpahan.
S.TRANSL: 田裡的草太長了，你去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡。
The grass in the fields is too tall. Go to the warehouse to take the sickle and let’s go to the fields.

S.FORM: Gaga psaan inu ka sowki kawir?
Gaga psaan ino ka sowki kawir?
Gaga siyaw rawa hiya, musa su rpun do qtaun su da.
Gaga siyaw rawa hiya, mosa so rpon do qtaon so da.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Qlhangi mangal, iya pluqih. mhungul bi ka sowki kawir.
Qlhangi mangal, iya ploqih. mhongol bi ka sowki kawir.
S.TRANSL: 小心拿，不要受傷。鐮刀很利。
Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Iya pstmaq ka wana mu!
Iya pstmaq ka wana mo!
Gaga inu ka wana su?
Gaga ino ka wana so?
Gaga truma qhuni ga ka wana mu.
Gaga troma qhoni ga ka wana mo.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Masu ini shungi?
Maso ini shongi?
Niqan tmasi mu hini, kika mkal ku gaga inu ka wana mu.
Niqan tmasi mo hini, kika mkal ko gaga ino ka wana mo.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: Srahug ka nii. psaun nami siyaw ayug qmrak qsurux.
Srahog ka nii. psaon nami siyaw ayog qmrak qsorox.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Yami hiya o ungat srahug, mduuy nami bhniq ngahi qmrak qsurux.
Yami hiya o ongat srahog, mdooy nami bhniq ngahi qmrak qsorox.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Aji ku dnuuy bhniq ngahi , tsai ku pxal da hug?
Aji ko dnooy bhniq ngahi , tsai ko pxal da hog?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Iq wa, supu ta musa pngahi qsurux pxal da.
Iq wa, sopo ta mosa pngahi qsorox pxal da.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Csaun su srahug ka pxal da.
Csaon so srahog ka pxal da.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Lmglug ka bhniq ngahi su da, ida bi niqan qsurux ka tjiyal da. brbil baraw nhari.
Lmglog ka bhniq ngahi so da, ida bi niqan qsorox ka tjiyal da. brbil baraw nhari.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Taga hay, lmglug bi ka asu da. brbil ku bhniq ngahi hini ka yaku. jiyagi ku usa mangal kaji gaga hiya.
Taga hay, lmglog bi ka aso da. brbil ko bhniq ngahi hini ka yako. jiyagi ko osa mangal kaji gaga hiya.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太晃了。我在這邊拉釣竿，你去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Brbil yaku hini ka qsurux . jiyagun nisu brbil.
Brbil yako hini ka qsorox . jiyagon niso brbil.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Tayal knsuyang kida! lala bi ngalan ta sayang, thngyan kana ka rawa qsurux da.
Tayal knsoyang kida! lala bi ngalan ta sayang, thngyan kana ka rawa qsorox da.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Jita sapah nhari ni pseasug ta kana.
Jita sapah nhari ni pseasog ta kana.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去和大家分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Miyah ka mtgsa da.
Miyah ka mtgsa da.
Iya rawa duri ha, Usa tluung tleegan nhari hiya.
Iya rawa dori ha, Usa tloong tleegan nhari hiya.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Ini ta kla, qsuqi ku dhuq da!
Ini ta kla, qsoqi ko dhoq da!
Iyah mtmay nhari.
Iyah mtmay nhari.
Tgpiya jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang hug?
Tgpiya jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang hog?
Tgrima jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang, jiyax sngayan ka saman, seupu ta mrawa ngangut kana ha!
Tgrima jiyax iyax sngayan ka sayang, jiyax sngayan ka saman, seopo ta mrawa ngangot kana ha!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: Duwa o! Jita yayung hiya.
Dowa o! Jita yayong hiya.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: Tgpiya jiyax iyax sngayan ka saman?
Tgpiya jiyax iyax sngayan ka saman?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: Tgtru jiyax iyax sngayan ka saman, Jita hmrapas gurug ka babaw ska hidaw saman ha!
Tgtro jiyax iyax sngayan ka saman, Jita hmrapas gorog ka babaw ska hidaw saman ha!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Mgrbu saman o mmanu ka qpahun su hug?
Mgrbo saman o mmano ka qpahon so hog?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: Jiyax sngayan ka saman, mowsa ku Pnrhulan tuhuy bubu mu.
Jiyax sngayan ka saman, mowsa ko Pnrholan tohoy bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Hmuya su da hug?
Hmoya so da hog?
Qntpbrih ku, mha ku ngangut han.
Qntpbrih ko, mha ko ngangot han.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Tkuni bi ka tunux mu.
Tkoni bi ka tonox mo.
Usa sangay knrikit ka isu.
Usa sangay knrikit ka iso.
Mtgsa, mnarux buyas mu, mha ku ngangut han.
Mtgsa, mnarox boyas mo, mha ko ngangot han.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Tduwa o, usa nhari.
Tdowa o, osa nhari.
Tduwa ku musa trima baga hug?
Tdowa ko mosa trima baga hog?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Aji biyaw malax matas da, usa kiya duri.
Aji biyaw malax matas da, osa kiya dori.
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Mtgsa, mnarux tunux mu, sangay ku babaw kndaxan han.
Mtgsa, mnarox tonox mo, sangay ko babaw kndaxan han.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Iq wa, qlahang musa sapah.
Iq wa, qlahang mosa sapah.
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Msangay ku bukuy tgkingal jiyax iyax sngayan, mha ku pqita empsapuh.
Msangay ko bokoy tgkingal jiyax iyax sngayan, mha ko pqita empsapoh.
S.TRANSL: 老師我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Iq o, qlahang nanak hiyi.
Iq o, qlahang nanak hiyi.
Gaga inu ka Iwal hug?
Gaga ino ka Iwal hog?
Mnarux buyas na, ga ngangut ka hiya.
Mnarox boyas na, ga ngangot ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Rudaw hug?
Gaga ino ka Rodaw hog?
Mtgsa, mnarux glu na ka Rudaw, ga msangay ka sayang.
Mtgsa, mnarox glo na ka Rodaw, ga msangay ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Rudaw has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Ma ini iyah ka Iwal hug?
Ma ini iyah ka Iwal hog?
Mnarux tunux na da.
Mnarox tonox na da.
Brahaw misu rngaw edaan su nanak hug.
Brahaw miso rngaw edaan so nanak hog.
Rudaw Taru ka hangan mu, maxal hngkwasan mu ka sayang.
Rodaw Taro ka hangan mo, maxal hngkwasan mo ka sayang.
S.TRANSL: My name is Rudaw Taru, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Ima ka hangan su hug?
Ima ka hangan so hog?
Rudaw Taru ka yaku.
Rodaw Taro ka yako.
Laqi su tnpusu seejiq tgima ka isu hug?
Laqi so tnposo seejiq tgima ka iso hog?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: Laqi Truku ka yaku.
Laqi Troko ka yako.
Tnpusu seejiq kana ka kingal ruwan sapah su hug?
Tnposo seejiq kana ka kingal rowan sapah so hog?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: kiya o, Truku kana ka kingal ruwan sapah nami.
kiya o, Troko kana ka kingal rowan sapah nami.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是太魯閣族人。
Yes, my whole family is Truku.

S.FORM: Tnpusu seejiq kana ka kingal ruwan sapah su hug?
Tnposo seejiq kana ka kingal rowan sapah so hog?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Aji, Truku ka tama mu, klmukan ka bubu mu.
Aji, Troko ka tama mo, klmokan ka bobo mo.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是太魯閣族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Truku, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: Laqi su ima ka isu hug?
Laqi so ima ka iso hog?
Laqi ku Taru Ilay ka yaku.
Laqi ko Taro Ilay ka yako.
Tama su ka gaga hug? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
Tama so ka gaga hog? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Mataru kmxalan hngkwasan na da.
Mataro kmxalan hngkwasan na da.
Tama su ka gaga hug? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
Tama so ka gaga hog? Piya ka hngkwasan na da?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Aji, Alang bukung nami ka hiya, maspat kmxalan hngkwasan na da.
Aji, Alang bokong nami ka hiya, maspat kmxalan hngkwasan na da.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Piya hngkwasan na ka qbsuran su snaw hug?
Piya hngkwasan na ka qbsoran so snaw hog?
Maxal maspat hngkwasan ka qbsuran mu snaw da.
Maxal maspat hngkwasan ka qbsoran mo snaw da.
Lala bi pncingan na hngkwasan ka qbsuran su snaw hug?
Lala bi pncingan na hngkwasan ka qbsoran so snaw hog?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Cbilaq nami rima hngkwasan ka yami.
Cbilaq nami rima hngkwasan ka yami.
Piya kmpraan hnigan hiyi su hug?
Piya kmpraan hnigan hiyi so hog?
Snkukuh qmbragan hnigan kingal kbkuy mspatul ka yaku.
Snkokoh qmbragan hnigan kingal kbkoy mspatol ka yako.
Qbsiya bi ini strung da, maa yaa bbaraw hnigan su da?
Qbsiya bi ini strong da, maa yaa bbaraw hnigan so da?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Kiya, kingal kbkuy mtrul ka snkukuh qmpragan hnigan mu da.
Kiya, kingal kbkoy mtrol ka snkokoh qmpragan hnigan mo da.
Maa su mtbnaw da?
Maa so mtbnaw da?
Aji, qneuqu su qmita da.
Aji, qneoqo so qmita da.
Meliwang su da hug?
Meliwang so da hog?
Aji, mtbnaw ku da.
Aji, mtbnaw ko da.
Mtbnaw su da hug?
Mtbnaw so da hog?
Kiya, Spngan hnjilan nkana mtrul mu ka sayang da.
Kiya, Spngan hnjilan nkana mtrol mo ka sayang da.
Mowsa su inu?
Mowsa so ino?
Mha ku qpahan ruwan sapah miing mtgsa.
Mha ko qpahan rowan sapah miing mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: Mowsa inu ka Rudaw gaga?
Mowsa ino ka Rodaw gaga?
Mha qmada sudu ka hiya.
Mha qmada sodo ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: He’s going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Rudaw hug?
Gaga ino ka Rodaw hog?
Gaga tmapaq tpaqan ka hiya, mha psdka tmapaq kiya ka hiya.
Gaga tmapaq tpaqan ka hiya, mha psdka tmapaq kiya ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He’s at the swimming pool. He’s going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka Iwal hug? Mha psdka tmalang kiya ka hiya.
Gaga ino ka Iwal hog? Mha psdka tmalang kiya ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Iwal在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Iwal? She’s going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Gaga mniq paru pprngagan ska ptasan ka hiya, saun mu mlawa ka hiya.
Gaga mniq paro pprngagan ska ptasan ka hiya, saon mo mlawa ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: She’s in the auditorium. I’ll go call her.

S.FORM: Tuhuy ta musa psbyaxan ha.
Tohoy ta mosa psbyaxan ha.
S.TRANSL: Let’s go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Mosa ku marig uqun ska hidaw han, mha ku miing isu kiya.
Mosa ko marig oqon ska hidaw han, mha ko miing iso kiya.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I’ll go buy lunch first, and then I’ll meet you later.

S.FORM: Jita mkudaw hdayu da!
Jita mkodaw hdayo da!
S.TRANSL: Let’s carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Usa miing seejiq isil, mha ku miing mtgsa.
Usa miing seejiq isil, mha ko miing mtgsa.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I’m going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Mha psdka gurug sbut ka sayang hug?
Mha psdka gorog sbot ka sayang hog?
S.TRANSL: Is Rudaw competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Aji, mha psdka pstaril pkbbaraw ka hiya.
Aji, mha psdka pstaril pkbbaraw ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: No, he’s competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Gdmhaw tmalang siida o mha su psdka baraw hug?
Gdmhaw tmalang siida o mha so psdka baraw hog?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Kiya o, mha ku psdka tmalang.
Kiya o, mha ko psdka tmalang.
Gdmhaw tmalang siida o mha su psdka baraw hug?
Gdmhaw tmalang siida o mha so psdka baraw hog?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Tduwa ku musa psdka gurug sbut.
Tdowa ko mosa psdka gorog sbot.
Gdmhaw tmalang nami jiyax siida o manu ka qpahun hug?
Gdmhaw tmalang nami jiyax siida o mano ka qpahon hog?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Psdka nami embblbil gasil ka yami.
Psdka nami embblbil gasil ka yami.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Msbarig ta uqun ka gdmhaw tmalang hug?
Msbarig ta oqon ka gdmhaw tmalang hog?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Aji, smbarig nami nghak gurug.
Aji, smbarig nami nghak gorog.
Mangal su tgkingal ngahan paru qrasan da o, tayal bi biyax!
Mangal so tgkingal ngahan paro qrasan da o, tayal bi biyax!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You’re amazing!

S.FORM: Mhuway balay.
Mhoway balay.
Gaga sapah ka payi hug?
Gaga sapah ka payi hog?
Nii hini, ga mtaqi tqiyan na ka hiya.
Nii hini, ga mtaqi tqiyan na ka hiya.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Gaga sapah ka payi hug?
Gaga sapah ka payi hog?
Ugat hini, hana wada ngangut ka hiya da, dhuq keeman ka miyah sapah.
Ugat hini, hana wada ngangot ka hiya da, dhoq keeman ka miyah sapah.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Gaga sapah ka baki hug.
Gaga sapah ka baki hog.
Ga tgdha tntunan ka hiya, usa baraw miing hiya da.
Ga tgdha tntonan ka hiya, osa baraw miing hiya da.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Niqan seejiq ka sapah hug?
Niqan seejiq ka sapah hog?
Kika Rudaw o, ini su qtai psiyaq da, embiyax su hug?
Kika Rodaw o, ini so qtai psiyaq da, embiyax so hog?
S.TRANSL: 是Rudaw阿，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Rudaw. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Embiyax bi! Meyah ku miing pprngaw sunan.
Embiyax bi! Meyah ko miing pprngaw sonan.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Gaga inu ka tama su hug?
Gaga ino ka tama so hog?
Ga pcsiyus damat hpuyan ka hiya, saun mu mlawa.
Ga pcsiyos damat hpoyan ka hiya, saon mo mlawa.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Wada inu ka Iwal da?
Wada ino ka Iwal da?
Wada qmrak biyi rudux hi da.
Wada qmrak biyi rodox hi da.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Baki, miyah nami da.
Baki, miyah nami da.
Ungat sapah hini ka baki namu, gaga qmpahan na, taga miyah sapah hiya ka yamu ha.
Ungat sapah hini ka baki namo, gaga qmpahan na, taga miyah sapah hiya ka yamo ha.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Miyah su da Swayi qbsuran tama!
Miyah so da Swayi qbsoran tama!
Psiyaq ini qpita, mdakil su da.
Psiyaq ini qpita, mdakil so da.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Mqaras bi qtaan misu miyah.
Mqaras bi qtaan miso miyah.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: Bgay namu kalat nii, psaay ska kulu huda.
Bgay namo kalat nii, psaay ska kolo hoda.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Masu psiyaq ini iyah, splawa mu kana miyah mkan nhapuy.
Maso psiyaq ini iyah, splawa mo kana miyah mkan nhapoy.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Ana qu wa , imah ku ucia kida, iyah ta pprngaw ruwan sapah.
Ana qo wa , imah ko ocia kida, iyah ta pprngaw rowan sapah.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Mhuway su bi peekan knan, mha ku da.
Mhoway so bi peekan knan, mha ko da.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Hana qrtan ka rudux nii, dsi musa qnhuway nanat mkan.
Hana qrtan ka rodox nii, dsi mosa qnhoway nanat mkan.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Pprngaw ta babaw kndaxan saman hug?
Pprngaw ta babaw kndaxan saman hog?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Duwa! strung ta inu?
Dowa! strong ta ino?
Pprngaw ta ptasan hug? meangal sasaw samaw ta.
Pprngaw ta ptasan hog? meangal sasaw samaw ta.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: Jita pslian niqan da 'mha ku plukus lukus seejiq tnpusu.
Jita pslian niqan da 'mha ko plokos lokos seejiq tnposo.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Alang nami ssnegil o suyang bi emphpah, tgai emphpah siida iyah miing knan.
Alang nami ssnegil o soyang bi emphpah, tgai emphpah siida iyah miing knan.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Ptaga bitaq srnabaw karat, qsuqi bi usuy da!
Ptaga bitaq srnabaw karat, qsoqi bi osoy da!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Iyah jiyax Mgay Bari ka isu da.
Iyah jiyax Mgay Bari ka iso da.
S.TRANSL: 那你感恩祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Thanksgiving Festival!

S.FORM: Iq o! gdungus mu bi balay!
Iq o! gdongos mo bi balay!
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Ma su tbarah miyah kndsan alang duri?
Ma so tbarah miyah kndsan alang dori?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Mha ku tmgsa da.
Mha ko tmgsa da.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Ma ini tgsa Alang Paru?
Ma ini tgsa Alang Paro?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Yaasa lmnglung ku alang mu, tai saw mha bbrinah alang uri
Yaasa lmnglong ko alang mo, tai saw mha bbrinah alang ori
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Mkla su bi tminun, Ima ka cmisa sunan.
Mkla so bi tminon, Ima ka cmisa sonan.
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Payi mu, hiya ka mkla bi tminun alang nami.
Payi mo, hiya ka mkla bi tminon alang nami.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Ma su kmsluhay tminun?
Ma so kmslohay tminon?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: Tminun o kndsan nami, ptlutut ku kndsan.
Tminon o kndsan nami, ptlotot ko kndsan.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Tayal knmalu mahan ka sinaw masu nii.
Tayal knmalo mahan ka sinaw maso nii.
Yaku nanak tmnbaqu psnagun o!
Yako nanak tmnbaqo psnagon o!
Tayal su biyax! Mha tmnbaqu psnagun bsiyaq bi hug?
Tayal so biyax! Mha tmnbaqo psnagon bsiyaq bi hog?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Ini o! Yaa bi kingal iyax sngayang da kida Sai psealu mhada ka dhquy ni buwax gmimax udung, kika tduwa phtngay kska turul da.
Ini o! Yaa bi kingal iyax sngayang da kida Sai psealo mhada ka dhqoy ni bowax gmimax odong, kika tdowa phtngay kska torol da.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米和白米先蒸熟，再加入麴粉一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: Manu ka sbrigun su hug?
Mano ka sbrigon so hog?
Niqan usik ni qusul ka naku. nhuma mu nanak kana o!
Niqan osik ni qosol ka nako. nhoma mo nanak kana o!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Piya pila ka sbrigun dha nii hug?
Piya pila ka sbrigon dha nii hog?
Kana o dha kbkuy mrimal pila.
Kana o dha kbkoy mrimal pila.
Kuxul mu ka lukus nii piya pila hug?
Koxol mo ka lokos nii piya pila hog?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Rima kbkuy ka nii.
Rima kbkoy ka nii.
Tayal bi kkray kida, tduwa mhnuk hari hug?
Tayal bi kkray kida, tdowa mhnok hari hog?
S.TRANSL: It's too expensive. Can't you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: Aji tduwa, nasi mhnuk do mha mlih pila mu da.
Aji tdowa, nasi mhnok do mha mlih pila mo da.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I'll lose money.

S.FORM: Iq wa! Asi ku barig kingal mqarux lukus.
Iq wa! Asi ko barig kingal mqarox lokos.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I'll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Enanun mu ka pucing ni gukung nii.
Enanon mo ka pocing ni gokong nii.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Kana 0 empusal kbkuy pila, gbaga mu nanak pseusa ka nii, sbkla bi bsiyaq jjiyun.
Kana 0 emposal kbkoy pila, gbaga mo nanak pseosa ka nii, sbkla bi bsiyaq jjiyon.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It's a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Pgkla mu lupung miyah marig, tduwa mkhnuk duri hug?
Pgkla mo lopong miyah marig, tdowa mkhnok dori hog?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I'll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Iq wa! jiyagun misu tnegkmbkiya maspat pskaun.
Iq wa! jiyagon miso tnegkmbkiya maspat pskaon.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I'll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Yahi qmita binaw ha! Niqan lukus qbubu ka sbrigun kana.
Yahi qmita binaw ha! Niqan lokos qbobo ka sbrigon kana.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Piya pila ka lukus hug?
Piya pila ka lokos hog?
Tru kbkuy mrimal pila ka kingal lukus, tru o maxal kbkuy pila.
Tro kbkoy mrimal pila ka kingal lokos, tro o maxal kbkoy pila.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Barig ku kingal kida, biqi saku bgurah ha.
Barig ko kingal kida, biqi sako bgorah ha.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I'll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Embiyax su, mkmbarig ku butul ni muruq hiyi mqrig.
Embiyax so, mkmbarig ko botol ni moroq hiyi mqrig.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Kduwan smbarig ka idaw da. Niqan ka sangas hlama mu na, barig su hug?
Kdowan smbarig ka idaw da. Niqan ka sangas hlama mo na, barig so hog?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Kiya hug! biqi ku kingal hug, maah ku marig pxal duri.
Kiya hog! biqi ko kingal hog, maah ko marig pxal dori.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I'll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Duwa, jiyagun misu duuy lubuy gmabul, saw kiya o mrimal pila.
Dowa, jiyagon miso dooy loboy gmabol, saw kiya o mrimal pila.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I'll pack it in a bag for you. That'll be 50 dollars.
